Nutrilife® enables food suppliers produce affordable, healthy and appealing food products while contributing to more efficient use of resources. Subject to customary closing conditions, the transaction is expected to complete on September 30, 2022.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/08/p-22-318.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/08/p-22-324" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/08/p-22-324.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Joint News Release - BASF and Corteva Agriscience collaborate to deliver the future of weed control to soybean farmers</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><b>Limburgerhof, Germany and Indianapolis, Indiana. </b>BASF and Corteva Agriscience today announced a long-term collaboration to develop new soybean weed control solutions for farmers around the world. The two companies agreed to cross-license soybean traits, while developing complementary herbicide technologies, enabling both companies to offer innovative soybean weed management solutions.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/08/p-22-309.html" 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">STMicroelectronics and trinamiX collaborate on behind-OLED face authentication solution to be showcased live at IFA 2022</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><i>Ludwigshafen (Germany), and Geneva (Switzerland) 24.08.2022</i> – STMicroelectronics (NYSE: STM), a global semiconductor leader serving customers across the spectrum of electronics applications, and trinamiX, a wholly owned subsidiary of BASF SE and pioneer of new biometric technologies, today announced their collaboration on a reference design for face authentication. The solution performs behind an OLED screen and on the security level required for mobile payments. A demonstration of this system will be first presented live at IFA 2022 in Berlin on September 2-6.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">August 24, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF and Sulzer Chemtech sign Memorandum of Understanding to collaborate in sustainable technologies</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF and Sulzer Chemtech (GTC Technology) have signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with the goal of advancing technologies for renewable fuels and chemically recycled plastics that will further expand the partners’ portfolio of sustainable solutions. The companies agreed to enter a strategic partnership to reduce the carbon intensity of renewable diesel and aviation fuel. They will also drive the development of innovative, cost-effective chemical processing solutions to improve the conversion of plastic waste into new plastics. The collaboration combines complementary areas of expertise, integrating Sulzer Chemtech’s capabilities in licensed processing technologies and mass transfer equipment with BASF’s cutting-edge high-performance adsorbents and catalysts.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">trinamiX launches spectroscopy solution for smartphones and highly secure face authentication in collaboration with Qualcomm Technologies</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><i>Ludwigshafen, 08-18-2022</i> – <a href="https://www.trinamixsensing.com/"><b>trinamiX GmbH</b></a><b>, a leader in biometric and infrared sensing solutions, introduces a near-infrared (NIR) spectroscopy module for smartphone integration as well as an all-in-one, easy-to-integrate face authentication solution in collaboration with Qualcomm Technologies, Inc.. trinamiX Face Authentication is powered by Qualcomm® Trusted Execution Environment (TEE) and trinamiX’s unique algorithms to raise the protection of users’ personal data. <b>Ludwigshafen, Germany, Bangalore, India, and Utrecht, The Netherlands, August 17, 2022 – </b>BASF Venture Capital GmbH, the corporate venture company of BASF SE, Germany, and Aqua-Spark, a Dutch investment fund focusing on the global aquaculture industry, are investing in Sea6 Energy Pvt. Ltd. (the company) as part of a Series B round. Sea6 Energy was founded in 2010 and is located in Bangalore, India. The company is a leader in the production and processing of tropical red seaweed. Other existing investors include Tata Capital Innovations Fund. With this investment, Sea6 Energy will complete its Series B transaction of INR 1402 million (about $18.5 million) in total.</sub></div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/08/p-22-312.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/08/p-22-310" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/08/p-22-310.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF again achieves its Palm Commitment: 100 percent  RSPO-certified palm (kernel) oil sourced in 2021 ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/08/p-22-310.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P310_RSPO_Palm_kernel_oel_1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">August 10, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF again achieves its Palm Commitment: 100 percent  RSPO-certified palm (kernel) oil sourced in 2021 </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF again reached its goal of sourcing all palm (kernel) oils certified from sustainable sources by the Roundtable on Sustainable Palm Oil (RSPO) in 2021. Based on a voluntary commitment, the company purchased 242,946 metric tons of certified palm kernel oil in 2021, representing 100% of the total procurement volume.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/08/p-22-310.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/08/p-22-305" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/08/p-22-305.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF enters power agreements for clean energy supply of more than 20 BASF sites across the United States||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/08/p-22-305.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P305e_08_03_VPPAs_NA:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">August 3, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF enters power agreements for clean energy supply of more than 20 BASF sites across the United States</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF is committed to renewable energy solutions to power its sites across the United States and has entered into virtual power purchase agreements (VPPAs) for wind and solar power totaling 250 megawatts (MW). They are designed to offset the carbon-intensive grid-supplied electricity being used at more than 20 of BASF’s manufacturing sites in several states across the country, from Texas to Michigan.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/08/p-22-305.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">The Hollandse Kust Zuid wind farm, which is currently under construction, has successfully generated its first electricity.&nbsp;While still in their testing phase, the first 27, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF Group 2nd Quarter 2022: BASF again with strong earnings despite continued high prices for raw materials and energy </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">“Despite the continued high raw materials and energy prices, we again achieved strong earnings in the second quarter,” said Dr.&nbsp;Martin Brudermüller, Chairman of the Board of Executive Directors of BASF&nbsp;SE, presenting the results for the second quarter of 2022 together with Chief Financial Officer Dr.&nbsp;Hans-Ulrich Engel. BASF had already released preliminary figures on July 11.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/07/p-22-291.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/07/p-22-297" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/07/p-22-297.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF transforms market towards certified, sustainably sourced coconut oil||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/07/p-22-297.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P297_coconut%20oil-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 26, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF transforms market towards certified, sustainably sourced coconut oil</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">With the certification of BASF’s production site in Cassina Rizzardi, Italy, BASF is the first chemical company offering certified sustainable personal care ingredients based on coconut oil. The company was certified according to the Rainforest Alliance Mass Balance Coconut certification scheme. Mass balance (MB) is a supply chain model that fosters the physical flow of certified raw materials within the supply chains, while the farmers benefit from selling Rainforest Alliance Certified coconuts and copra. &nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/07/p-22-297.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/07/p-22-287" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/07/p-22-287.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF to strengthen its commitment as a leading ingredients partner in nutrition, flavor and fragrance industries||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/07/p-22-287.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P287_Citral_plant_at_BASF_site_in_Ludwigshafen:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 21, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF to strengthen its commitment as a leading ingredients partner in nutrition, flavor and fragrance industries</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, Germany – BASF’s Nutrition &amp; Health division is strengthening its position as ingredients partner for the animal nutrition and human nutrition industries by combining the strategic and operational responsibility in one global business unit, Nutrition Ingredients. In doing so, the focus will be on leveraging and further strengthening core product platforms and assets for vitamins and carotenoids that are deeply rooted into the BASF Verbund as well as expanding the business with feed enzymes.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/07/p-22-287.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/07/p-22-288" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/07/p-22-288.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF expands world-scale vitamin A formulation plant in Ludwigshafen||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/07/p-22-288.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 21, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF expands world-scale vitamin A formulation plant in Ludwigshafen</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, Germany – BASF is strengthening its market position in vitamin A by expanding its world-scale formulation capacities at its Verbund site in Ludwigshafen. The state-of-the art facility, which is fully integrated into vitamin production at the site, will support and further expand the production of high-quality vitamin A powder products for the animal nutrition industry. Start-up is planned for mid-2023 and will stepwise increase BASF’s vitamin A powder formulation capacities in line with the increased vitamin&nbsp;A acetate production capacity.</div><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BRITA, leading brand in water filtration, has today announced it has selected, among others, the recently introduced range of INEOS Styrolution’s sustainable NAS® ECO as materials of choice for its portfolio of water filter jugs. The styrenic plastic material NAS ECO, a styrene methyl methacrylate (SMMA), is the result of a cooperation between INEOS Styrolution and BASF. It is built on BASF’s production of styrene monomer derived from renewable feedstock based on the mass balance approach. The project is on schedule. The focus will now be on building the core of the Verbund, which includes a steam cracker and several downstream plants for the production of petrochemicals and intermediates, among others. BASF will invest up to €10&nbsp;billion by 2030 to build the new Verbund site.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/07/p-22-300.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/07/p-22-261" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/07/p-22-261.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Boortmalt and BASF collaborate to promote climate-smart agriculture||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/07/p-22-261.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P261_climate-smart_agriculture-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 19, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Boortmalt and BASF collaborate to promote climate-smart agriculture</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Limburgerhof, Germany; Athy, Ireland; July 19, 2022 – BASF Agricultural Solutions and Boortmalt, the world’s leading malted barley provider, today announce their program to jointly reduce CO<sub>2</sub> emissions associated with barley production in Ireland. With this third step of its multiphase capacity expansion, BASF will increase production capacity to 600,000 metric tons per year by the middle of the decade and support the ongoing growth of its North American MDI customers. The company kicked off the expansion project in 2018 with a staggered approach consisting of three investment phases. The investment in the final expansion phase from 2022 to 2025 amounts to $780 million.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF’s IrgaCycle™ stabilizes recycled plastics used to protect pineapples from sunburn in Malaysia </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Hong Kong SAR, China – July 19, 2022 – BASF and 3T Industries Sdn Bhd, a leading recycling company in Malaysia dealing with post-industrial and post-consumer recyclates, are helping pineapple plantations in Malaysia to increase their yields and save resources. For the first time, 3T Industries has applied BASF’s IrgaCycle<sup>TM</sup> UV033 DD to enhance 100% recycled high density polyethylene (HDPE) sheets used as protectors for pineapples.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/07/p-22-298.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/07/p-22-282" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/07/p-22-282.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF introduces PuriCycle® portfolio of catalysts and adsorbents to enable plastics recycling ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/07/p-22-282.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P282_Visual_BASF_PuriCycle-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 13, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF introduces PuriCycle® portfolio of catalysts and adsorbents to enable plastics recycling </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF launches PuriCycle<sup>®</sup>, a new line of advanced high-performance products for the purification of most complex waste plastics pyrolysis feeds. The PuriCycle portfolio includes novel catalysts and adsorbents developed to selectively remove or convert a wide range of impurities in pyrolysis oils and enable downstream processing of circular plastics streams. PuriCycle can help customers meet industry compositional compliance standards, benefit from high efficiency purification and upgrading solutions, and increase their flexibility in the chemical recycling process of plastics.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 11, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF Group releases preliminary figures for the second quarter of 2022</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen – July 11, 2022 – BASF has released preliminary figures for the second quarter of 2022. <b>Sales </b>increased by 16 percent in the second quarter of 2022 to €22,974&nbsp;million (Q2 2021: €19,753&nbsp;million). This was mainly driven by higher prices; currency effects, primarily relating to the U.S. dollar, had a positive effect as well. Volumes declined slightly compared with the prior-year quarter. Sales thus exceeded average analyst estimates for the second quarter of 2022 (Vara: €21,737 million).</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/07/p-22-286.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/07/p-22-277" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/07/p-22-277.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Joint News Release - BASF Venture Capital Invests in Climentum Capital’s First Fund ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/07/p-22-277.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P277e_pexels_quang_nguyen_vinh_2157925:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 5, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Joint News Release - BASF Venture Capital Invests in Climentum Capital’s First Fund </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><b>Ludwigshafen, Germany, and Copenhagen, Denmark, July 5, 2022 –</b> BASF Venture Capital GmbH, the corporate venture arm of BASF, has invested in Climentum Capital’s first €150 million venture fund. This project is intended to make an important contribution to reducing greenhouse gas emissions, establishing the use of low-CO<sub>2</sub> technologies in chemical production and reducing the site’s natural gas consumption. As a first step, the project partners are conducting a feasibility study that is expected to be completed by the end of 2022.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/07/p-22-278.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-239" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-239.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF launches VerdessenceTM RiceTouch, a new biopolymer for a smooth and powdery light skin feel, suitable for a broad range of personal care products||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-239.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 30, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF launches VerdessenceTM RiceTouch, a new biopolymer for a smooth and powdery light skin feel, suitable for a broad range of personal care products</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Düsseldorf, Germany – June 30, 2022 – A new addition hits the Verdessence<sup>TM</sup> product family: BASF’s Care Creations<sup>®</sup> is launching the new biopolymer <a href="https://www.carecreations.basf.com/products-formulation/products/products-detail/Verdessence%e2%84%a2%20ricetouch/30795238">Verdessence<sup>TM</sup> RiceTouch</a> on the global market. This plant based sensory powder with small particle size provides powdery light and smooth skin feel and is ideal for matte type cosmetics. It is perfectly suited for various fields of natural and organic cosmetics including face and body care, hair care and body cleansing, color cosmetics and sun care while reducing greasiness of formulations.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-239.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-270" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-270.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Joint News Release - Confoil and BASF cooperate to develop certified compostable dual ovenable paper tray for packaging of ready-to-eat meals||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-270.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P270e_Pressefoto_Confoil_ecovio_0186_a:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 29, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Joint News Release - Confoil and BASF cooperate to develop certified compostable dual ovenable paper tray for packaging of ready-to-eat meals</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Bayswater, Australia/Ludwigshafen, Germany, June 29, 2022: The Australian food packaging manufacturer Confoil and BASF have cooperated to develop a certified compostable and dual ovenable food tray based on paper. The paper tray is coated on the inside with BASF’s ecovio® PS 1606, a partly bio-based and certified compostable biopolymer especially developed for coating food packaging made of paper or board. The trays called DualPakECO® are certified according to the Australian standard AS4736-2006 and food contact approved according to international requirements. They can be used for ready-to-eat meals like lasagne, curries and stir-fries available as cold or frozen in supermarkets as well as for catering and take-away from restaurants.</div><div 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">ams OSRAM and trinamiX jointly release demonstration of ultra-secure face authentication behind OLED</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">ams OSRAM, a global leader in optical solutions, and trinamiX GmbH, a wholly owned subsidiary of BASF SE and pioneer of new biometric technologies, today announced the development of a demonstration system that shows face authentication from behind an OLED screen with the ultra-high security performance required for mobile payments.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-269.html" class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 27, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Biotic rejuvenation support: BASF’s Care Creations® launches skin care ingredients based on bacterium found in youthful skin</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Pulnoy, France – June 27, 2022 – With Probiolift™ and Postbiolift™, BASF’s Care Creations<sup>®</sup> is introducing two new biotic ingredients that support healthful and graceful skin aging. Unlike other biotics existing on the cosmetic market, the newly developed ingredients are the first to use a bacterium that is found naturally in the skin: <i>Lactobacillus crispatus</i> (<i>L. crispatus</i>), a Gram-positive rod shape anaerobic bacterium that has been found to decrease with age.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 22, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Shell qualifies BASF Puristar® and BASF Sorbead® for green hydrogen purification</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF has worked with Shell to evaluate and de-risk BASF’s Puristar<sup>®</sup> R0-20 and Sorbead<sup>® </sup>Adsorption<sup> </sup>Technology for the use in green hydrogen production. The two technologies purify and dehydrate the product hydrogen stream from the water electrolysis process which can then be used for liquification and transportation, as an energy source or chemical feedstock. The Puristar<sup> </sup>and Sorbead technologies are now in Shell’s portfolio for potential use in Shell’s global green hydrogen projects.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-266.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-265" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-265.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF at K 2022: Accelerating the journey towards a sustainable future with plastics||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-265.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P265_Teaser:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 21, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF at K 2022: Accelerating the journey towards a sustainable future with plastics</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><p>BASF will present its journey to advance towards the goal of a circular economy at K 2022 trade fair, which is the #1 trade fair for plastics and rubber. K 2022 takes place in Düsseldorf, Germany, from October 19 – 26, 2022, celebrating its 70th anniversary. BASF has been exhibiting at K ever since the trade fair debuted back in 1952, continuously showing its commitment to the plastics industry and ability to create breakthroughs together with its customers.</p>
<p>“At K 2022, our theme is ‘Go!Create – Welcome to Our Plastics Journey’,” says Dr. Martin Jung, President Performance Materials, “We invite all visitors to join our journey towards a sustainable future with plastics. We will show products and&nbsp; solutions and more than that we want to give insights in our concepts and plans. The Plastics Journey towards a more sustainable economy needs a co-operative approach and has a long way to go. That’s what we want to express.” The Plastics Journey consists of three phases which represent the lifecycle of plastics: MAKE, USE, and RECYCLE. BASF offers market-leading products and solutions for all three phases of this journey.&nbsp;</p>
</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-265.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-249" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-249.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF to build commercial scale battery recycling black mass plant in Schwarzheide, Germany||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-249.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P249_BASF_Black-Mass-Processing-Plant-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 20, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF to build commercial scale battery recycling black mass plant in Schwarzheide, Germany</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF will build a commercial scale battery recycling black mass plant in Schwarzheide, Germany. This investment strengthens BASF’s cathode active materials (CAM) production and recycling hub in Schwarzheide. The site is an ideal location for the build-up of battery recycling activities given the presence of many EV car manufacturers and cell producers in Central Europe. This investment will create about 30 new production jobs, with startup planned for early 2024.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-249.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-264" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-264.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Strategic partnership delivers best practice example of a closed recycling loop for PET-based multilayer||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-264.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P264_BASF_PET_Lifecycle_Infografic_220615:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 20, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Strategic partnership delivers best practice example of a closed recycling loop for PET-based multilayer</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Multilayer packaging based on polyethylene terephthalate (PET) can have a bright and sustainable future. The independent testing and certification body cyclos-HTP systematically investigated the recyclability of PE/PA multilayer films on behalf of BASF and confirmed it in June 2021. The results and conclusions of these investigations are now available in a 25-page publication on the websites of BASF and cyclos-HTP.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-255.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-256" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-256.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF strengthens market position for optical brighteners||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-256.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 9, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF strengthens market position for optical brighteners</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF has completed a double-digit million euro investment to increase production capacity for Tinopal<sup>®</sup> CBS optical brighteners at its Monthey site. Following phase one of the stepwise capacity increase in 2021, the recent completion of the investment program has now brought significantly increased capacity on stream to meet growing global customer demand.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-256.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-238" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-238.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||New Licity® grade with improved properties optimized for anodes with a silicon content exceeding 20%||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-238.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P233e_BASF_Dispersion_Visual:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 8, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">New Licity® grade with improved properties optimized for anodes with a silicon content exceeding 20%</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF has extended its series of Licity® anode binders for Li-ion battery manufacturing. The second-generation styrene-butadiene rubber (SBR) binder Licity® 2698 X F facilitates the use of silicon contents exceeding 20%. In addition to the established properties of the Licity<b>® </b>product family, this binder enables higher capacity, increased number of charge/discharge cycles and reduced charging times.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-238.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-251" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-251.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF offers range of chemical intermediates with product carbon footprint significantly below global market average||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-251.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 7, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF offers range of chemical intermediates with product carbon footprint significantly below global market average</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF has calculated the individual product carbon footprints (PCF) of a large part of its portfolio of chemical intermediates. The results were compared with assessments of market-wide average carbon footprints of the corresponding products of third parties. The outcome of the analysis shows that due to the production set-up the PCF of a range of BASF’s chemical intermediates is significantly below the global average PCF of the corresponding third-party chemicals, all produced from fossil-based raw materials.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-251.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Fratelli Guzzini selects sustainable Styrenics Solution from INEOS Styrolution based on biomass balanced styrene from BASF</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Fratelli Guzzini has today announced it has selected a range of INEOS Styrolution’s sustainable NAS® ECO as materials of choice for its new range of drinkware solutions. NAS ECO is a styrene methyl methacrylate (SMMA) material, which is the result of a cooperation between INEOS Styrolution and BASF. It is built on BASF’s production of styrene monomer derived from renewable feedstock based on a mass balance process. INEOS Styrolution uses the material as feedstock in its production of new sustainable styrenics solutions. First customer in tableware and household appliances to benefit from the new solutions is Fratelli Guzzini, a world leading company in this sector.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/06/p-22-243.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-236" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-236.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF Bioenergy launches its new brand SpartecTM||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-236.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P236_SpartecTM:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 31, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF Bioenergy launches its new brand SpartecTM</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><p>SAN DIEGO, CA,<i> May 31, 2022 –</i> BASF Bioenergy launches its new brand Spartec<sup>TM </sup>for the North American bioethanol market. With the new brand, BASF establishes a new standard for performance and service. “The new brand Spartec<sup>TM</sup> demonstrates our commitment to addressing key customer needs such as improving plant performance by increasing yields, improving plant efficiency, and reducing carbon intensity,” says Danielle Cusumano, Head of Bioenergy Business, BASF Enzymes.</p>

State-of-the-art technology and products to identify the grade of plastic, to improve efficiencies in the cleaning processes for recycling, and to boost the quality of recycled polymeric materials will be featured. As an integral part of BASF’s existing research and development (R&amp;D) facilities for automotive coatings solutions, the automotive coatings application center covers over 400 square meters of floor area and is equipped with state-of-the-art equipment, such as high precision climate-controlled spray booth and electrostatic rotary bell applicators, and advanced quick connection system for electrostatic applications. The facility is meticulously designed to enable customer-oriented R&amp;D activities coupled by accurate simulation of OEM paint shops.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-235.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-222" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-222.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BTC Europe and NXTLEVVEL Biochem sign agreement to distribute biobased and biodegradable solvents throughout Europe||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-222.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 24, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BTC Europe and NXTLEVVEL Biochem sign agreement to distribute biobased and biodegradable solvents throughout Europe</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BTC Europe GmbH and NXTLEVVEL Biochem have recently signed an agreement on the distribution of biobased and biodegradable solvents derived from levulinic acid for the European market. Levulinic acid can serve as a versatile building block for chemicals and materials derived directly from biomass. Due to their broad solvency power, low volatility, high safety profile and biodegradability levulinate solvents offer a sustainable alternative to solvents based on fossil feedstock for a wide range of applications.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-222.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF launches Ultradur® B4335G3 HR HSP – all-rounder for reliable protection||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-229.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P229_Raddrehzahlsensor-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 16, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF launches Ultradur® B4335G3 HR HSP – all-rounder for reliable protection</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">In automotive electrics, many small components are of great importance. Delicate wheel speed sensors, for example, play a crucial role in the safe functioning of a vehicle. They detect the wheels’ number of revolutions and pass on the information to the ABS and ESP. This is critical in driving situations such as an emergency break as it enables the systems to take preemptive actions to maintain vehicle stability and steering ability. Because they are positioned next to the wheels, the sensors are exposed to extreme climatic conditions and media such as splash water and salt.<b></b></div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-229.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-230" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-230.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF and BMW Group rely on renewable raw materials for automotive coatings||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-230.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P230_BMW_i40_M50_Frozen_Portimao_Blue_01-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 12, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF and BMW Group rely on renewable raw materials for automotive coatings</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">The BMW Group is the first carmaker to place its trust in more sustainable automotive OEM coatings certified according to BASF’s biomass balance approach. The BMW Group has chosen to use BASF Coatings’ CathoGuard<sup>®</sup> 800 ReSource e-coat at its plants in Leipzig, Germany, and Rosslyn, South Africa, and the iGloss<sup>®</sup> matt ReSource clearcoat throughout Europe. Using these more sustainable product versions for vehicle coatings enables CO<sub>2</sub> avoidance of around 40% per coating layer; this will reduce the amount of CO<sub>2</sub> emitted in the plants by more than 15,000 metric tons by 2030.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-230.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-223" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-223.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||New color-stable polyamide for electromobility||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-223.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P223_22_Teaser_2_High_Voltage_Connector:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 11, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">New color-stable polyamide for electromobility</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">With Ultramid<sup>®</sup> A3U44G6 DC OR (PA66 - GF30 FR), BASF is expanding its portfolio of flame-retardant engineering plastics for the eMobility market. High technical requirements from the industry require innovative solutions based on PA66. In the case of already proven Ultradur<sup>®</sup> (PBT) products, color stability can be largely guaranteed, especially in orange (RAL 2003) which is in high demand in the industry. Conventional polyamides, however, tend to strong color fluctuations or yellowing during heat aging.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-223.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-221" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-221.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||More safety, better health: Basotect® as sound absorber in innovative air filters||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-221.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P221_Basotect_airtubeUVC80_cover-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 10, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">More safety, better health: Basotect® as sound absorber in innovative air filters</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">The air purification specialist UVCclean, Germany now uses the BASF melamine resin foam Basotect<sup>®</sup> as sound absorber in its mobile airtubeUVC air filter systems. These filters use UV-C technology to lower the concentration of aerosols that transmit bacteria, spores and viruses such as the coronavirus in the air. They can be installed in schools, kindergartens, offices and restaurants, as well as at hairdressers, in waiting rooms, hotel lobbies, conference rooms and production facilities.</div><div 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Onsite PV backsheet checks at the push of a button: trinamiX launches handheld NIR solution for fast material identification</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><i>10 May 2022 (Ludwigshafen, Germany) –</i> trinamiX GmbH,<b> </b>a subsidiary of BASF SE, today announced the market launch of a novel solution for rapid onsite material analysis of Photovoltaic (PV) module encapsulations and backsheets. With trinamiX’s Mobile Near-Infrared Spectroscopy Solution, customers now gain transparency about the materials built into those protective layers of PV modules. In a matter of seconds, trinamiX’s handheld device provides users with relevant information about the identified material on their smartphone. This way, malfunctioning and poorly performing PV modules caused by material flaws in the protective layers can be either identified during regular checks at solar farms or reclaimed upon arrival as part of incoming quality controls.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-227.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-205" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-205.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Busbar holders made of Elastollan® R 2600 FHF – More safety for future mobility ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-205.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P205_Busbar_holder-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 5, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Busbar holders made of Elastollan® R 2600 FHF – More safety for future mobility </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">The transformation of the car from the combustion engine to the electric powertrain is progressing. Highly efficient battery systems are the key to success of electromobility as the power is transmitted from the charging components to the battery and from there to the electric motor. This is done by metal busbars. Plastic overmoldings ensure electrical insulation of the busbars and, thus, safe distribution of the high-voltage currents.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-205.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-220" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-220.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF ramps up methane sulfonic acid output||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-220.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P220_IMG_20220404_102141-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 5, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF ramps up methane sulfonic acid output</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><b>Ludwigshafen, Germany – May 5, 2022</b> – Global demand for methane sulfonic acid (MSA) has increased steadily over the past years. This trend is fueled by a growing interest in environmentally optimized products and formulations. In response to growing customer demand, BASF has invested a higher double-digit million euro amount to expand production capacities at the Verbund site in Ludwigshafen.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-220.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-219" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-219.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF receives ISO-17025 certification for thermocouple lab at Fremont, California site||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-219.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P219e_BASF_Temperature_Sensing:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 4, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF receives ISO-17025 certification for thermocouple lab at Fremont, California site</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">ISELIN, NEW JERSEY, May 4, 2022 – BASF has received ISO-17025 certification for thermocouple production at the Fremont, California site. The accreditation certifies the capability of performing thermocouple calibration between 0 and 1500 °C for both base metal and precious metal thermocouples.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-219.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-225" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-225.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF increases prices for its Refinery Catalysts portfolio globally||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-225.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 4, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF increases prices for its Refinery Catalysts portfolio globally</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">With immediate effect, BASF’s Refinery Catalysts business will increase prices for its portfolio globally. Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 3, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Cloudfarms cooperates with SUISAG to launch innovative application enabling individual tracking of pigs from birth to processing</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Together with SUISAG, the service partner for Swiss pig producers and international genetics customers, Cloudfarms introduces an innovative application of its existing production management system to pig producers. The “Pig Passport” enables breeding farms, production farms and processors to register and analyze production data of each individual pig from birth to processing. The registered production data contains information such as the pig's genetic pedigree, feed consumption, or health information. An electronic ear tag connected to the Cloudfarms Mobile App allows fast, reliable, and easy data entry for each pig directly in the barn. The individual animal data are made available in real-time reports through the Cloudfarms web application.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/05/p-22-218.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/04/p-22-207" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/04/p-22-207.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF achieves strong EBIT before special items despite significantly higher energy and raw materials prices ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/04/p-22-207.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/Auswahl_Fahnen_D16_002_Fahnen_2016:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; They succeed Anke Schäferkordt (59) and Franz Fehrenbach (72), who have stepped down from the Supervisory Board as of the end of the Annual Shareholders’ Meeting 2022 due to their many years of service on the Board.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/04/p-22-213.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/04/p-22-215" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/04/p-22-215.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF to wind down activities in Russia and Belarus except for business that supports food production||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/04/p-22-215.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">April 27, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF to wind down activities in Russia and Belarus except for business that supports food production</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">As announced on March 3, 2022, BASF has not conducted new business in Russia and Belarus, in light of the war of aggression against Ukraine ordered by the Russian government. technology and demonstrate significant sustainability benefits||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/04/p-22-204.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P204_Star_Process_2022-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">April 26, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF and thyssenkrupp Uhde optimize STAR process® dehydrogenation technology and demonstrate significant sustainability benefits</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF and thyssenkrupp Uhde achieved measurable improvements in the STAR process<sup>®</sup>, a proprietary dehydrogenation process from thyssenkrupp Uhde that can produce propylene from propane feedstocks, or iso-butylene from iso-butane feedstocks. The technology has been optimized to reduce CO<sub>2</sub> emissions and operating costs through lower energy consumption by up to 30%, while also reducing investment costs and enabling additional feedstock savings. Started in 2020, thyssenkrupp Uhde focussed in this joint development on the optimisation and further development of the STAR process, while BASF validated the targeted improvements through an extended test program.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/04/p-22-204.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/04/p-22-210" data-tracking-value="news||New flame-retardant polyphthalamides for stable electronic components without corrosion||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/04/p-22-210.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P210_Ultramid_Advanced_RTI-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">April 26, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">New flame-retardant polyphthalamides for stable electronic components without corrosion</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF is now expanding its polyphthalamide (PPA) portfolio by a variety of flame retardant grades that combine high thermal stability with excellent electrical insulation and low water uptake. They are characterized by high electrical RTI values (RTI=relative thermal index) above 140°C while being halogen-free according to EN 50642, thus preventing corrosion and failure of electrical parts when used under moist conditions. The non-halogenated PPAs based on PA9T, PA66/6T, PA6T/66 and PA6T/6 also allow for better colorability and long color stability. With these new flame retardant grades, BASF offers a tailored E&amp;E portfolio which opens new possibilities for applications like connectors for power or data transmission in vehicles, appliances and consumer electronics as well as for e-mobility parts, miniature circuit breakers, switch gear and sensors.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/04/p-22-210.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/04/p-22-203" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/04/p-22-203.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF introduces UpCore™, a cost-effective upgrade to ozone-VOC converters for healthier aircraft cabin air||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/04/p-22-203.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img
