alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">April 25, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF introduces UpCore™, a cost-effective upgrade to ozone-VOC converters for healthier aircraft cabin air</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF launches UpCore™, a new service providing a cost-effective and sustainable technology upgrade from a standard ozone converter to an ozone-VOC (volatile organic compounds) converter for cleaner and healthier cabin air. UpCore replaces the catalyst core of an ozone-only converter with an ozone-VOC catalyst, a sustainable solution as the original converter’s housing is reused. The dual function technology catalytically removes VOCs from the cabin air while maintaining BASF’s industry leading ozone-removal performance.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/04/p-22-203.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/04/p-22-211" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/04/p-22-211.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF and its employees donate an additional €4.2 million for people in Ukraine||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/04/p-22-211.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/Auswahl_Fahnen_D16_002_Fahnen_2016:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">April 25, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF and its employees donate an additional €4.2 million for people in Ukraine</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">2,110,156 €: This is how much BASF employees donated to the BASF Stiftung (BASF Foundation) as part of the company-wide initiative #ColleaguesForUkraine – by far the highest result of an employee donation campaign in BASF's history. The company will double the amount. This means that a total of more than €4.2 million will benefit BASF colleagues from Ukraine and others affected by the war.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/04/p-22-211.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/04/p-22-209" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/04/p-22-209.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Vattenfall and BASF participate in offshore wind farm tender Hollandse Kust West||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/04/p-22-209.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P209_Vattenfall_Egmond_aan_Zee_offshore_wind_farm-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">April 22, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Vattenfall and BASF participate in offshore wind farm tender Hollandse Kust West</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Vattenfall will participate in the offshore wind farm tender for Hollandse Kust West (HKW) Sites VI and VII, partnering with BASF for Site VI. The offshore wind farms are of great significance for both companies in achieving their sustainability goals. The renewable electricity from Hollandse Kust West would be another important step towards Vattenfall’s ambition to create fossil-free living within one generation and would support BASF’s ambitious goal to reach net zero CO<sub>2</sub> emissions by 2050.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/04/p-22-209.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/04/p-22-206" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/04/p-22-206.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Advance Notice: Virtual Annual Shareholders’ Meeting and Quarterly Statement Q1 2022 on April 29, 2022||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/04/p-22-206.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/Auswahl_Fahnen_D16_002_Fahnen_2016:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">April 20, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Strong pipeline of BASF agricultural innovations will benefit food security, climate and environment</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF announces its ten-year outlook on agricultural innovations that support food security for future generations, while minimizing the impact of farming on the climate and the environment. The company focuses on improving agricultural outcomes in major crops, like wheat, canola, soybean, corn, cotton, rice, as well as fruits and vegetables. According to estimates from the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO), these crops account for more than 50% of the world’s farmland, which is why innovations applied on such a large scale have the potential to make farming even more productive and sustainable.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/04/p-22-110.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/04/p-22-201" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/04/p-22-201.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF Group releases preliminary figures for first quarter of 2022||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/04/p-22-201.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">April 11, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF Group releases preliminary figures for first quarter of 2022</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen – April 11, 2022 – BASF has released preliminary figures for the first quarter of 2022. <b>Sales </b>increased by 19 percent in the first quarter of 2022 to €23,083&nbsp;million (Q1&nbsp;2021: €19,400&nbsp;million). This was mainly driven by higher prices; currency effects, mainly relating to the U.S. dollar, had a slightly positive effect. Sales thus slightly exceeded average analyst estimates for the first quarter of 2022 (Vara: €21,982 million).</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/04/p-22-201.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-160" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-160.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||During this year’s Beauty Days BASF launches Plantapon® Soy, a bio-based surfactant made from soy protein for mild rinse-off applications||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-160.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">March 31, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">During this year’s Beauty Days BASF launches Plantapon® Soy, a bio-based surfactant made from soy protein for mild rinse-off applications</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Consumer demand for natural cosmetics is growing rapidly, being one of the personal care industry’s most important drivers. benefits.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-160.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">March 31, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF and Henkel focus on renewable raw materials in Henkel’s consumer goods products </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen/Düsseldorf – BASF and Henkel jointly commit to replacing fossil carbon feedstock with renewable feedstock for most products in Henkel’s European Laundry &amp; Home Care and Beauty Care businesses over the next four years following a successful pilot with Henkel’s cleaning and detergent brand Love Nature in 2021. Through the cooperation, the fossil feedstock for around 110,000 tons of ingredients per year will be substituted with renewable feedstock using BASF’s certified biomass balance approach. As a result, Henkel’s core brands like Persil, Pril, Fa and Schauma will come with a reduced carbon footprint, avoiding around 200,000 tons of CO<sub>2</sub> emissions in total.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-196.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read BASF will also introduce its dedicated sustainability program ‘Responsibly Active’ for its botanical supply chains. class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Reusable to-go mugs made of Ultrason® for a sustainable lifestyle</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Bottle manufacturer Yiwu Midi Technology, Zhejiang has selected Ultrason® P 3010 from BASF to produce reusable to-go mugs for the market launch of its new business segment. Because of its durability, high-temperature resistance and design versatility the BASF polyphenylsulfone (PPSU) offers a unique combination of lifestyle attributes and sustainability for high-quality to-go cups that are lightweight, shatter-proof and fashionable: Ultrason® P 3010 maintains the flavor of e.g. coffee without any impact on taste or odor. At the same time, the BASF thermoplastic polymer contributes to less packaging waste as the mugs can be reused many times and thus support a circular economy.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-173.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-183" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-183.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF continues global partnership with WorldSkills to develop new talent in the car painting industry||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-183.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P183e_01_WorldSkills:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">March 23, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF continues global partnership with WorldSkills to develop new talent in the car painting industry</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF’s Coatings division has signed a new multi-year Global Industry Partnership with WorldSkills International. class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF’s Care Creations® and the non-governmental organization Beyond Suncare have renewed their cooperation, which aims to protect people with 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">New Fourtitude™ FCC catalyst maximizes butylenes helping to improve performance for refiners</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF launched today Fourtitude™, a new Fluid Catalytic Cracking (FCC) catalyst designed to maximize butylenes from resid feedstocks. Fourtitude, the latest product based on BASF’s award-winning multiple framework topology (MFT) technology, is optimized to deliver superior selectivity to butylenes while maintaining catalyst activity.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-162.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/10/p-20-330" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/10/p-20-330.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF to increase production capacity for synthetic ester base stocks in Jinshan, China||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/10/p-20-330.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P330e_BASF_Synlubes_Jinshan_300px:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">March 11, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF to increase production capacity for synthetic ester base stocks in Jinshan, China</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF will almost double the production capacity for its synthetic ester base stocks at its site in Jinshan, China. The investment comes in response to the rising demand for high-performance lubricants in Asia Pacific and further strengthens BASF’s position as a reliable supplier that strongly supports customers’ growth in the region.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/10/p-20-330.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-168" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-168.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF closes EPS recycling loop and launches Neopor® McycledTM containing recycled material ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-168.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P168_neopor_015_PI-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">March 11, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF closes EPS recycling loop and launches Neopor® McycledTM containing recycled material </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><b>Ludwigshafen, Germany, 11 March 2022</b> – BASF has expanded its portfolio of graphitic expandable polystyrene (EPS) granulate. Neopor<sup>®</sup> F 5 Mcycled<sup>TM</sup> contains 10&nbsp;per cent recycled material and is suitable for numerous applications in buildings, particularly facade insulation. The new raw material is produced using the extrusion process and offers the same proven mechanical properties and optimised insulation performance as Neopor<sup>®</sup> F 5200 Plus.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-168.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-174" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-174.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF opens new laboratory building||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-174.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P174_BASF_Laboratory_Muenster_01-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">March 11, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF opens new laboratory building</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF opened a new laboratory building for the development of automotive refinish coatings and innovations beyond paint at its site in Münster, Germany. It underlines the Coatings division’s global position as a future-oriented and innovative company. “It is another component of our positioning as a global innovation center of BASF Coatings. We are thus complementing a series of global technical innovations. This includes the ‘Lean Lab’, which we started operating in 2018 at this site, as well as our plant for the functionalization of films for various industries,” highlighted Uta Holzenkamp, head of BASF’s Coatings division.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-174.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF acquires site for North American battery materials and recycling expansion in Canada</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen/Germany and Quebec/Canada, March 4, 2022 – BASF signed an agreement to secure land for its future cathode active materials and recycling site in Bécancour, Quebec, Canada, as part of its commitment to support North American producers in their transition to e-mobility. A regional supply chain is critical to ensure reliable and resilient battery materials supply.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-133.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-142" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-142.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF builds new plant for alkylethanolamines at Antwerp site||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-142.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P142_Verbund_Site_Antwerp_Belgium-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">March 1, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF builds new plant for alkylethanolamines at Antwerp site</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF builds a new world-scale production plant for alkylethanolamines at the Verbund site in Antwerp, Belgium. After the planned start-up in 2024, the company will increase the global annual production capacity of its alkylethanolamines portfolio containing, amongst others, dimethylethanolamines (DMEOA) and methyldiethanolamines (MDEOA) by nearly 30 percent to more than 140,000 metric tons per year. With a high degree of local backward integration, BASF ensures a reliable and sustainable production of alkylethanolamines. With production facilities for this portfolio at its sites in Ludwigshafen, Germany; Antwerp, Belgium; Geismar, Louisiana and Nanjing, China, BASF is one of the world’s leading producers of alkylethanolamines.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-142.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-147" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-147.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF expands its network of EFfCI’s Good Manufacturing Practice certified sites and plants ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-147.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">March 1, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF expands its network of EFfCI’s Good Manufacturing Practice certified sites and plants </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><b>Düsseldorf, Germany – March 1, 2022 </b>– BASF’s Care Creations<sup>®</sup> has expanded its global network of sites and plants for the production of personal care ingredients that have been awarded Good Manufacturing Practice (GMP) by the European Federation for Cosmetic Ingredients (EFfCI). Up to now, 26 sites and plants that are related to BASF’s personal care business worldwide have been certified. The latest additions were a plant in Ludwigshafen, Germany and the White Stone site in South Carolina, USA. The EFfCI GMP certification confirms that the sites and plants meet the strict requirements of, for example, product quality and hygiene standards during manufacturing processes.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-147.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-150" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-150.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Extremely safely packed in ex zones||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-150.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P150_22_Press_Photo-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">March 1, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Extremely safely packed in ex zones</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">The film innovation DUO EX-TRA by the film manufacturer DUO PLAST AG in Lauterbach, Germany, is equipped with the static dissipative polymer Elastostat®. This creates the first stretch film suitable for use in potentially explosive atmospheres. The newly developed film avoids the ignition source electrostatics. Thus, stretched pallet units no longer pose an explosion hazard.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-150.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-161" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-161.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF donates €1 million in emergency humanitarian aid to Ukraine ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-161.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/A16_0008_2017:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">March 1, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF donates €1 million in emergency humanitarian aid to Ukraine </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Following the attack on Ukraine ordered by the Russian government, the civilian population is suffering from the escalating violence. Hundreds of thousands are on the run. To help the people in the country, BASF has provided €1 million in emergency aid.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/03/p-22-161.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-151" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-151.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Jeffrey DeAlmeida appointed new Senior Vice President of BASF Pharma Solutions||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-151.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P151_Jeff_DeAlmeida_BASF-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">February 28, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Jeffrey DeAlmeida appointed new Senior Vice President of BASF Pharma Solutions</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><i>FLORHAM PARK, NJ, February 28, 2022 –</i><b> </b>BASF Corporation today announced the appointment of Jeffrey&nbsp;DeAlmeida to the role of Senior Vice President, Pharma Solutions and Nutrition &amp; Health Americas, effective March 1, 2022. He succeeds Christian Seufert, who has decided to transition to a role outside the company.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more significantly increased sales and earnings in the 2021 business year. “It was a strong and successful year for BASF,” said Chairman of the Board of Executive Directors, Dr.&nbsp;Martin Brudermüller, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">SWISS equips entire Boeing 777-300ER fleet with AeroSHARK</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">SWISS has decided to equip its entire Boeing long-haul fleet with the fuel-saving AeroSHARK surface technology. Starting in the middle of the year, a total of twelve Boeing 777-300ERs will gradually be fitted with the riblet films developed jointly by Lufthansa Technik and BASF. The significantly reduced frictional resistance resulting from this modification will make the sub-fleet more than one percent more fuel-efficient and lower in emissions.</div><div 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF further invests in its strategic partner B2B Cosmetics to scale-up its individualized personal care product technology</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, Germany, February 23, 2022 – After the initial investment by BASF in 2019, B2B Cosmetics and BASF have continued the development of the Emuage<sup>®</sup> technology, a system which delivers freshly-made, personalized cosmetics to the users. The Emuage technology allows users to create their own individualized personal care products by simply choosing capsules, placing them into the machine and receiving the final product – for example for hair, sun or skin care.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-154.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-137" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-137.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Advance Notice: Annual Press Conference on February 25, 2022, at 9.30 a.m. (CET)||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-137.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/Fahnen_A16_0008_20171:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">February 17, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Advance Notice: Annual Press Conference on February 25, 2022, at 9.30 a.m. (CET)</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">On Friday, February&nbsp;25,&nbsp;2022, we will present the 2021 financial results at&nbsp;7.00&nbsp;a.m.&nbsp;(CET). From 9.30&nbsp;a.m.&nbsp;(CET) BASF’s Chairman of the Board of Executive Directors Dr.&nbsp;Martin&nbsp;Brudermüller and CFO Dr.&nbsp;Hans-Ulrich&nbsp;Engel will present the results in an online-conference.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-137.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-144" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-144.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF sets a new standard for efficient product development of sustainable cosmetics with the launch of Emollient Maestro||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-144.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">February 17, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF sets a new standard for efficient product development of sustainable cosmetics with the launch of Emollient Maestro</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Monheim am Rhein, Germany – February 17, 2022 – With the introduction of its <a href="https://www.carecreations.basf.com/landingpage-mastering-emollients/">Emollient Maestro</a>, BASF’s Care Creations<sup>®</sup> is once again raising the bar for smart development of sustainable, high-performing personal care products. Thanks to artificial intelligence (AI) modelling, the digital service calculates ideal emollient mixes according to user briefings, and allows for the targeted replacement of industry benchmarks such as cyclopentasiloxane, dimethicone or mineral oils.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-144.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-149" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-149.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Changes in responsibilities on the Board of Executive Directors of BASF||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-149.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">February 17, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Changes in responsibilities on the Board of Executive Directors of BASF</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">The BASF Board of Executive Directors has decided on changes to the responsibilities in two Board Ressorts. These will take effect on March 1, 2022, and are structured as follows:</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-149.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-148" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-148.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF’s Care Creations® opens the doors to its virtual showroom in March||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-148.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">February 16, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF’s Care Creations® opens the doors to its virtual showroom in March</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><b>Monheim am Rhein, Germany – February 16, 2022 –</b> From March 29 to 31, BASF’s Care Creations<sup>®</sup> will host its second virtual Beauty Days event. On a digital customer platform, the company will present its latest ingredient solutions and concepts. The virtual showroom will serve both as an information hub and a central meeting place for live events and one-on-one chats with specialists.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-148.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-141" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-141.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF launches RegXcellence® for plastic additives, a new service for Regulatory Excellence||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-141.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">February 15, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF launches RegXcellence® for plastic additives, a new service for Regulatory Excellence</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, Germany – February 15, 2022 – BASF launches a new service offering, RegXcellence<sup>®</sup>, for its plastic additives customers which enables targeted access to a range of global regulatory support. RegXcellence provides digital solutions and simplifies regulatory issue management with advisory support to accelerate innovation opportunities.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-141.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-146" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-146.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF and NEVEON co-operate on mattress recycling||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-146.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">February 15, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF and NEVEON co-operate on mattress recycling</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF and foam specialist NEVEON are working together to further develop the recycling of mattresses. The aim is to establish a closed product loop for mattresses. Currently, discarded mattresses are mainly thermally recycled or disposed of in landfills. BASF and NEVEON want to change this and return mattress foams to the product life cycle. As early as this year, the two companies plan to obtain the first pilot quantities of recycled mattress foams made from collected used mattresses. The next step will then be to transfer the recycling to a larger scale in subsequent years.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-146.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-131" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-131.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF has developed new adhesives for labels that no longer interfere with paper and paperboard recycling||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-131.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P131_D22_003_Labels_r-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">February 14, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF has developed new adhesives for labels that no longer interfere with paper and paperboard recycling</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF has achieved a breakthrough in the development of adhesives that do not interfere with the recycling of transport boxes, such as paperboard and cardboard boxes with paper labels coated with Acronal RCF 3705 or Acronal RCF 3706. By developing the recycling friendly adhesives, BASF has made a decisive contribution towards more sustainable labeling and reaffirms their commitment to achieving a sustainable circular economy as set forth in the European Union’s Green Deal. The innovative adhesive technologies open up completely new possibilities for a working circular economy, both in the packaging industry as well as in many other sectors.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-131.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-134" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-134.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF replaces plant for 2-Mercaptoethanol in Ludwigshafen||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-134.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">February 14, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF replaces plant for 2-Mercaptoethanol in Ludwigshafen</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">A new BASF production plant for the intermediate 2-mercaptoethanol (2-ME) at the Ludwigshafen Verbund site started regular operations in the fourth quarter of 2021. After a trial run of several months, it replaces the previous plant at the Ludwigshafen site, which is being closed after more than 40 years of operation. The new plant is fully integrated into BASF's production Verbund and, with more than 10,000 metric tons of 2-ME per year, has the same production capacity as the previous plant. 2-ME has proven its value in the production of plastics, crop protection products, oilfield chemicals (Basocorr<sup>®</sup> ME) and coatings.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-134.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-135" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-135.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF and Heraeus to form a joint venture offering world-class precious metal recycling solutions in China||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-135.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">February 11, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF and Heraeus to form a joint venture offering world-class precious metal recycling solutions in China</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen and Hanau, Germany – BASF and Heraeus have agreed to form a joint venture (BASF: 50%; Heraeus: 50%) to recover precious metals from spent automotive catalysts. The new company named BASF HERAEUS (China) Metal Resource Co., Ltd will be set up in Pinghu, China. The founding of the legal entity is targeted in Q1 2022, following the approval of the relevant authorities. Construction is planned to begin in 2022, with start of operations in 2023.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-135.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-136" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-136.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF Venture Capital and Orbia Ventures Invest in Israeli Biotech Company FortePhest||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-136.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P136_MG_1243-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">February 10, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF Venture Capital and Orbia Ventures Invest in Israeli Biotech Company FortePhest</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF Venture Capital GmbH (BVC) and Orbia Ventures today announce their Series-B investment in the Israeli biotech startup FortePhest. Founded in 2017, FortePhest is developing a new technology to combat herbicide-resistant weeds and invasive plants. Inspired and informed by natural plant processes, the company supports crop protection on a global scale by implementing this technology. BASF Venture Capital and Orbia Ventures are joined by Sherpa InnoVentures, SIBF II and other investors for this funding round. Funding parties have agreed not to disclose the financial details of the investment.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-136.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-132" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-132.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF expands portfolio of climate friendly products introducing the first isocyanate not carrying a CO2 backpack||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-132.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">February 7, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF expands portfolio of climate friendly products introducing the first isocyanate not carrying a CO2 backpack</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF expands the portfolio of methylene diphenyl diisocyanate (MDI) and introduces with Lupranat<sup>®</sup> ZERO (Zero Emission, Renewable Origin) the first greenhouse gas neutral aromatic isocyanate. Lupranat ZERO has an accounting Cradle-to-Gate&nbsp;Product Carbon Footprint&nbsp;(PCF) of zero; this means that on its way until it leaves the BASF factory gate for the customer - all product-related greenhouse gas emissions and the biobased carbon bound in the product taken together - it does not carry a CO<sub>2</sub> backpack. Zero emissions up to the factory gate are achieved without offset certificates. Instead, renewable raw materials are used at the beginning of the chemical production chain and allocated via a mass balance process. In addition, renewable energies are used for the manufacturing process with green energy certificates (e.g. Renewable Energy Certificates).&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-132.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">trinamiX Face Authentication is the first to be certified as highly secure behind OLED</h3><div class="search-result__description" These engineering plastics, previously sold as Technyl<sup>®</sup>, will continue at BASF under the established brand name Ultramid<sup>®</sup>. Customers globally will benefit from an extensive plastics portfolio including both PA66 grades and Ultramid<sup>®</sup> One J, a PPA based on PA66/6T. Thus, BASF will support its customers in developing innovative plastics solutions across all industries, for example for E&amp;E applications like connectors and circuit breakers, for consumer and household electronics, and for autonomous driving and emobility.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF develops seed variety for the first tearless onion entering the European market</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Nunhem, the Netherlands – February 1, 2022 – BASF’s vegetable seeds business developed a tearless onion variety which has now been launched at supermarkets in France, Germany, Italy, and United Kingdom. The yellow onion variety constitutes a breakthrough in vegetable innovation and is a real gamechanger as the first tearless onion available to the market. It is a result of more than three decades of conventional breeding efforts. Its benefit: while onions usually become more pungent while being stored, this variety becomes milder and sweeter over time.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/02/p-22-127.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/01/p-22-124" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/01/p-22-124.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF modernizes production of chloroformates and acid chlorides at Ludwigshafen site||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/01/p-22-124.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">January 31, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF modernizes production of chloroformates and acid chlorides at Ludwigshafen site</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF is to fundamentally modernize the entire infrastructure, including the facilities for the production of chloroformates and acid chlorides at its Ludwigshafen Verbund site. The company is investing a low three-digit million euro amount for this. The measures, which will be completed in the course of 2025, will increase the company's capacity for these products at the site by around 30 percent. BASF is one of the world's leading manufacturers of chloroformates, acid chlorides and alkyl chlorides, with a current annual capacity of 60,000 metric tons, as well as production facilities at its sites in Ludwigshafen, Germany, and Yeosu, Korea.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/01/p-22-124.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/01/p-22-119" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/01/p-22-119.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||D’lite: BASF’s digital service to the personal care industry||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/01/p-22-119.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">January 27, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">D’lite: BASF’s digital service to the personal care industry</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, Germany, January 27, 2022 –&nbsp;D’lite is BASF’s new digital subscription service for the personal care industry helping customers to identify the perfect cosmetic product offering. The right ingredients are defined by considering a huge amount of data while taking into account fast-changing market dynamics. BASF supports the customer in the complete product development process: from consumer understanding, market understanding, concept creation, market strategy development, formulation development up to the launch of the product via this platform.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/01/p-22-119.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/01/p-22-120" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/01/p-22-120.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Small and incredibly fast – new connector system with Ultradur®||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/01/p-22-120.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P120_MD_Elektronik-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">January 27, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Small and incredibly fast – new connector system with Ultradur®</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">The transformation of the car continues. Alternative powertrains, autonomous driving and the urge for more sustainability impact the vehicle design and driving experience. Particularly, the car interior is experiencing a unique transformation. It is changing into a mobile office and living room. Applications such as the instrument panel are transformed into entertainment units with screens for video conferencing. Electronic devices with additional functions require ever higher data rates. This represents immense requirements for the high-performance equipment and, thus, for the electronic components and materials used. In addition, it is necessary to reduce weight and to use smaller components due to less space.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/01/p-22-120.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/01/p-22-115" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/01/p-22-115.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF expands production capacity for feed enzymes||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/01/p-22-115.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">January 26, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF expands production capacity for feed enzymes</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF has expanded the production capacity of its enzymes plant in Ludwigshafen, Germany. Through the expansion of the existing plant, BASF has significantly increased the annual number of feasible fermentation runs. The larger production capacity enables BASF to meet the growing global demand from customers for a reliable high-quality supply of the BASF feed enzymes Natuphos<sup>®</sup> E (phytase), Natugrain<sup>®</sup> TS (xylanase and glucanase) and the recently launched Natupulse<sup>®</sup> TS (mannanase). The expanded enzyme plant has already started production and larger quantities of BASF feed enzymes are now available.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/01/p-22-115.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/01/p-22-117" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/01/p-22-117.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF and Innospec collaborate to bring increased value to ethanol producers||/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/01/p-22-117.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">January 26, 2022</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF and Innospec collaborate to bring increased value to ethanol producers</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><p>SAN DIEGO, CA, and ENGLEWOOD, CO, January 26, 2022 –<a href="https://www.basf.com/us/en.html"> </a>BASF Enzymes LLC and Innospec Fuel Specialities LLC have entered into a distribution agreement to increase the overall value to the customers and to show their commitment to the ethanol yield industry. As part of this collaboration, BASF will be the distributor of DCI-11 Plus ClearTrak™ – a concentrated corrosion inhibitor – to ethanol plants located within the United States.&nbsp;</p>

The new plant is set to increase BASF’s annual HMD production capacity to 260,000 metric tons. Production is expected to start in 2024. Furthermore, BASF will expand its polyamide 6.6 production in Freiburg, Germany starting 2022.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/01/p-22-102.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" The program amounts to up to €3&nbsp;billion, shall start in January 2022 and be concluded by December 31, 2023, at the latest, subject to a renewed authorization to repurchase own shares by the Annual Shareholders’ Meeting of BASF SE on April 29, 2022. BASF SE will cancel all repurchased shares and reduce the share capital accordingly.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2022/01/p-22-106.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2021/12/p-21-412" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2021/12/p-21-412.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF reaches agreement to divest its site in Quincy, Florida to Clariant ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2021/12/p-21-412.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">December 28, 2021</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF reaches agreement to divest its site in Quincy, Florida to Clariant </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, Germany and Charlotte, North Carolina, USA, December 28, 2021 – BASF has reached an agreement to divest its manufacturing site in Quincy, Florida and the associated attapulgite business for a purchase price of US$60 million to Clariant. data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">December 13, 2021</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF achieves Leadership Status in CDP rating 2021</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">The non-profit organization CDP (formerly the Carbon Disclosure Project) has again ranked BASF as one of the world’s leading companies for its water management and forest and climate protection measures. BASF achieved an A- rating in all three categories. “We are proud that BASF has again been recognized as a global leader by CDP this year. This is a confirmation of our commitment to sustainability and demonstrates how deeply BASF’s activities to protect the climate, water and forests are anchored in our strategy,” said Dr. Christoph Jäkel, who heads BASF’s corporate sustainability unit.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2021/12/p-21-407.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2021/12/p-21-391" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2021/12/p-21-391.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF Research Press Conference 2021: Sustainability Starts in Research||/global/en/media/news-releases/2021/12/p-21-391.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P391_01_BASF_Performance_Materials_2-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">December 9, 2021</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF Research Press Conference 2021: Sustainability Starts in Research</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">With its innovative processes and products, the chemical industry makes an important contribution to reducing greenhouse gas emissions. BASF researchers are already contributing to making the sustainability transformation possible through their work. Current innovation examples from BASF’s research pipeline for mobility and agriculture, such as innovative coolants for electric cars or new precision application technologies for agriculture, were presented today at the company’s Research Press Conference by Dr. Melanie Maas-Brunner, Member of the Board of Executive Directors and Chief Technology Officer of BASF SE, along with BASF scientists.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2021/12/p-21-391.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2021/12/p-21-406" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2021/12/p-21-406.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF introduces Natupulse® TS – an innovative feed enzyme to unlock valuable nutrients||/global/en/media/news-releases/2021/12/p-21-406.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">December 9, 2021</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF introduces Natupulse® TS – an innovative feed enzyme to unlock valuable nutrients</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF has launched the new enzyme product Natupulse® TS for animal feed. Natupulse® TS is a non-starch polysaccharide (NSP) enzyme. As an endo-1,4-ß-D-mannanase, it hydrolyzes ß-mannans into smaller components, e.g. manno-oligosaccharides (MOS). The addition of ß-mannanase to the feed decreases digesta viscosity, increases the digestibility of the feed and ensures a more sustainable production.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2021/12/p-21-406.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2021/12/p-21-390" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2021/12/p-21-390.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF to carve out mobile emissions catalysts business and invest up to €4.5 billion in battery materials and recycling||/global/en/media/news-releases/2021/12/p-21-390.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">December 7, 2021</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF to carve out mobile emissions catalysts business and invest up to €4.5 billion in battery materials and recycling</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">With the shift toward electromobility, the automotive industry is currently in the middle of its biggest transformation in history. As the largest chemicals supplier to the automotive industry, BASF will further strengthen its focus on battery materials and recycling and will establish a separate mobile emissions catalysts, automotive catalysts recycling and associated precious metal services entity. The new entity will be named BASF Automotive Catalysts and Recycling.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2021/12/p-21-390.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2021/12/p-21-400" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2021/12/p-21-400.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF to sell 25.2% of the offshore wind farm Hollandse Kust Zuid to Allianz||/global/en/media/news-releases/2021/12/p-21-400.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/JLOUSBERG_20210617_SIF_HKZ_R2_2980_PRINT-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">December 6, 2021</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF to sell 25.2% of the offshore wind farm Hollandse Kust Zuid to Allianz</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Allianz Capital Partners, on behalf of Allianz Insurance Companies (Allianz), and BASF have agreed on the purchase of 25.2% of the windfarm Hollandse Kust Zuid (HKZ) by Allianz. This follows a transaction between Vattenfall and BASF under which BASF acquired 49.5% of HKZ from Vattenfall on September 1, 2021.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF Agricultural Solutions to launch Global Carbon Farming Program enabling farmers to reduce their CO2 emissions</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">With agriculture being responsible for about 20% of global CO<sub>2</sub> emissions, carbon-efficient agricultural practices can significantly contribute to combat climate change. BASF will establish a program that allows farmers to track and profit from practices reducing CO<sub>2</sub> emissions, underlining its efforts to contribute to fighting climate change. The Global Carbon Farming Program will support BASF Agricultural Solutions’ commitment to reduce the carbon footprint per ton of crop produced by 30% by 2030 in wheat, soy, rice, canola and corn. BASF will launch its program in phases starting in 2022.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled"
