The vehicle, scheduled to launch later this year, just won the prestigious Altair Enlighten Award for achievements in vehicle weight savings for reduced mass of the third row seat. In the previous model, the third-row seat was comprised of 15 different steel components, making it very heavy. Toyota wanted the 2021 Sienna’s third seat to be lighter and cost competitive while exceeding all performance criteria.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/08/p-20-268.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/08/p-20-266" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/08/p-20-266.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||100 percent naturally derived: BASF launches Lamesoft® Balance for efficient stabilization of rinse-off formulations ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/08/p-20-266.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">August 6, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">100 percent naturally derived: BASF launches Lamesoft® Balance for efficient stabilization of rinse-off formulations </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">With Lamesoft<sup>®</sup> Balance, BASF launches a product for the stabilization of ingredients in skin and hair cleansing formulations that is derived from 100 percent natural feedstock. Acting as a natural structure enhancer in surfactant-based systems, it allows to stabilize wax-based opacifiers in rinse-off applications – even in low viscosity formulations. It provides a pleasant and homogenous rheology in finished formulations.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/08/p-20-266.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/08/p-20-265" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/08/p-20-265.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF South East Asia joins ZDHC Foundation to scale up sustainability in the leather, textile, and footwear industry||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/08/p-20-265.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P265e_press_photo_18x27:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="lazyload rendition" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">August 5, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF South East Asia joins ZDHC Foundation to scale up sustainability in the leather, textile, and footwear industry</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Singapore – August 5, 2020 – BASF South East Asia has joined the ZDHC Foundation as a “Contributor” in its Chemical Industry category. The partnership with the Foundation and its extensive pool of experts from organizations in the textile, apparel, leather and footwear industry underlines BASF’s commitment to being an industry leader in driving sustainable chemistry, innovation and best practices. Additionally, Haptex<sup>®</sup> is the first BASF material solution that has received the ECO PASSPORT by OEKO-TEX<sup>®</sup> certification for the production of synthetic leather.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/08/p-20-265.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/08/p-20-263" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/08/p-20-263.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||trinamiX Beam Profile Analysis Works Where Facial Recognition Fails Due to Face Protection Masks||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/08/p-20-263.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">August 3, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">trinamiX Beam Profile Analysis Works Where Facial Recognition Fails Due to Face Protection Masks</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">August 03, 2020 – Ludwigshafen, Germany – trinamiX, a wholly-owned&nbsp;subsidiary&nbsp;of BASF,&nbsp;today announced its acclaimed Beam Profile Analysis technology can help existing facial recognition systems to recognize an owner and unlock their device, even while wearing a protective mask to prevent the spread of COVID-19. trinamiX&nbsp;user authentication technology recognizes living skin and&nbsp;simultaneously&nbsp;measures the 3D features of a face. It&nbsp;also&nbsp;integrates&nbsp;seamlessly with standard 2D facial recognition&nbsp;algorithms.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/08/p-20-263.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-248" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-248.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF Group: EBIT before special items declines in second quarter due to weaker demand as a result of the corona pandemic||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-248.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/Auswahl_Fahnen_D16_002_Fahnen_2016:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="lazyload rendition" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 29, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF Group: EBIT before special items declines in second quarter due to weaker demand as a result of the corona pandemic</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">As expected, the economic effects of the corona pandemic had a much stronger impact in the second quarter of 2020 than in the first quarter of this year. Customer industries were affected to varying degrees: BASF was particularly negatively impacted by the collapse in demand from the automotive industry, while demand from the detergent and cleaner industry and the food industry was stable. BASF was able to continue production at all important sites worldwide.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-248.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-259" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-259.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF signs preferred supplier partnership with Jaguar Land Rover in Asia Pacific||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-259.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/JLR1-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 29, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF signs preferred supplier partnership with Jaguar Land Rover in Asia Pacific</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF’s Coatings (BASF) division and Jaguar Land Rover's (JLR) global headquarters have signed a cooperation agreement with Glasurit and R-M, premium refinish paint brands of BASF, to support the development and implementation of JLR’s Global Body &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 28, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF calculates CO2 footprint of all sales products</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF will provide its customers with total values of CO<sub>2</sub> emissions, so called “carbon footprints” for all of its products. The Product Carbon Footprint (PCF) comprises all product-related greenhouse gas emissions that occur until the BASF product leaves the factory gate for the customer: from the purchased raw material to the use of energy in production processes.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-260.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-255" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-255.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Nina Schwab-Hautzinger to lead Corporate Communications  and Government Relations at BASF as of November 2020||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-255.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P255_20_Teasert:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; She succeeds Anke Schmidt (50) and will report in this position to Dr. Martin Brudermüller, Chairman of the Board of Executive Directors. As already announced in March, Schmidt will leave the company at her own request on July 31, 2020. Altrium incorporates BASF’s newest Advanced Innovative Matrix (AIM) and the proven technology IZY (Improved Zeolite-Y). It has been optimized to increase transportation fuels yield (gasoline and distillate) while having a deeper coke selective bottoms conversion of resid feeds.&nbsp;&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-253.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-256" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-256.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Karp resigns from the Supervisory Board of BASF SE||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-256.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 22, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Karp resigns from the Supervisory Board of BASF SE</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">At the end of the Supervisory Board meeting on July 22, 2020, Dr. Alexander C. Karp, CEO Palantir Technologies Inc., resigned from his position as a member of BASF SE’s Supervisory Board for professional reasons. Karp is therefore no longer a member of the Supervisory Board of BASF SE.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-256.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-243" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-243.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Joint News Release - BASF and IntelliSense.io partner to accelerate the mining industry’s digital transformation ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-243.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P243e_Intelisense.io_and_BASF_18x27:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 21, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Joint News Release - BASF and IntelliSense.io partner to accelerate the mining industry’s digital transformation </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><b>Ludwigshafen, Germany and Cambridge, UK – July 21, 2020</b> – Global chemical company BASF and IntelliSense.io, a leading industrial artificial intelligence (AI) company, announced an exclusive partnership which will combine their expertise in mineral processing, ore beneficiation chemistry and industrial AI technology. The joint offering is called the ‘BASF Intelligent Mine powered by IntelliSense.io’ and delivers AI solutions embedded with BASF’s mineral processing and chemical expertise. This solution will enable mine operations to become more efficient, sustainable and safe.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-243.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-246" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-246.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF invests in technology company SmartAHC, a specialist in artificial intelligence for animal husbandry||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-246.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/Teaser_P246_20_piglets_grid:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 20, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF invests in technology company SmartAHC, a specialist in artificial intelligence for animal husbandry</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Shanghai, China, and Ludwigshafen, Germany, July 20, 2020 – BASF Venture Capital is investing in SmartAHC, a leading supplier of digitalization solutions for pig farming on the Chinese market. SmartAHC was founded in 2014 by graduates of Nanyang Technological University in Singapore. The Shanghai-based startup provides customized digital solutions to increase efficiency throughout the pork value chain. Other investors include specialty chemicals producer Evonik and China’s Shenzhen Sinoagri E-Commerce.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-246.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-242" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-242.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Joint News Release - thyssenkrupp and BASF sign joint development agreement on STAR process® dehydrogenation technology||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-242.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P242e_Star_Process:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 15, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Joint News Release - thyssenkrupp and BASF sign joint development agreement on STAR process® dehydrogenation technology</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">thyssenkrupp and BASF have signed a joint development agreement to expand their cooperation on the STAR process<sup>®</sup>. This proprietary dehydrogenation process from thyssenkrupp produces propylene from propane feedstocks, or iso-butylene from iso-butane feedstocks, using an exceptionally stable catalyst. thyssenkrupp, focusing on process development, and BASF, focusing on catalyst development, together aim to significantly increase the resource and energy efficiency of the process through targeted improvements in catalyst and plant design. Plant operators can benefit from lower investment and operating costs as well as lower CO<sub>2</sub> emissions in the future.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-242.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-244" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-244.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF and Isobionics launch Isobionics Santalol, an alternative to sandalwood oil ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-244.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P244e_FrauMitSandelholz_18x27:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 15, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF and Isobionics launch Isobionics Santalol, an alternative to sandalwood oil </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, Germany, July 15, 2020 - BASF Nutrition &amp; Health and Isobionics<sup>®</sup> are launching their first joint product, Isobionics<sup>®</sup> Santalol. Thanks to its woody odor profile, the new fragrance in BASF's portfolio is a convincing alternative to sandalwood oil.&nbsp;<span style="font-size: 0.8125rem;">The proprietary manufacturing process of Isobionics Santalol makes the product unique. It is produced on a biotechnological basis from renewable raw materials: The starting material for the fermentation process is corn starch obtained from corn grown in Europe. Fermentation is an ancient cultural technique known from processes such as brewing beer and baking bread. In this process, a substance is converted into another substance with the help of microorganisms such as bacteria or fungi.</span></div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-244.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-240" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-240.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||First registration worldwide for BASF’s Tirexor® herbicide in Australia||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-240.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P240e_Tirexor_registration_18x26:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 13, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">First registration worldwide for BASF’s Tirexor® herbicide in Australia</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Melbourne, Australia –<b> </b>BASF received the world’s first registration for the company’s innovative Tirexor<sup>® </sup>herbicide by the Australian Pesticides and Veterinary Medicines Authority (APVMA). The active ingredient Tirexor is the first new mode of action for the burndown of grass weeds in 20 years. Australian growers of wheat, durum and barley will be first to use Tirexor based products, marketed under the Voraxor<sup>®</sup> brand. It allows them to enhance the spectrum and longevity of their pre-emergent weed control. Further dossier submissions for Tirexor in other countries across Asia, South and North America are planned.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-240.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-241" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-241.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF Group: operating result in the second quarter of 2020 above market expectations; net income below market expectations due to impairment of shareholding in Wintershall Dea, mainly from oil and gas prices</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen – July 10, 2020 – BASF has released preliminary figures on business development in the second quarter of 2020. Sales declined by 12.4 percent in the second quarter of 2020 to €12,680 million (Q2 2019: €14,478 million). EBIT before special items, which reflects the development of the BASF Group’s operating business in the second quarter of 2020, amounted to an expected €226 million, above market expectations and in the range indicated by BASF, but considerably below the figure for the prior-year quarter (Q2 2019: €995 million).&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-241.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-231" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-231.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF invests in next-generation farming for livestock producers with Cloudfarms’ digital platform solution||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/07/p-20-231.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 7, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF invests in next-generation farming for livestock producers with Cloudfarms’ digital platform solution</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF acquired <a href="https://cloudfarms.com/">Cloudfarms</a>, a software company for livestock farm management, traceability and precision farming with focus on pig production. 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">New Application for trinamiX Near-Infrared Spectroscopy Solutions: Plastic Sorting Made Easy</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><b>July 01, 2020 – Ludwigshafen, Germany –</b> trinamiX GmbH, a wholly owned subsidiary of BASF, today announced it has developed a new application for its mobile Near-Infrared (NIR) Spectroscopy Solutions related to plastic sorting and recycling. Using trinamiX technology, the diverse compositions of different plastics can now be precisely determined and thus distinguished via the simple use of a portable handheld device that combines trinamiX data analysis with a mobile app. As such, recycling and recyclability are improved, paying off for both the environment and businesses alike.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-tracking-value="news||Engineering plastic with optimized sliding friction properties||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-229.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 30, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Engineering plastic with optimized sliding friction properties</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF is launching an engineering plastic that is particularly suited for automotive parts that come into contact with hot oil. The new polyethersulfone (PESU) Ultrason<sup>®</sup> E0510 C2TR shows very good tribological properties, high oil resistance and excellent dimensional stability also with broad ranges of temperature fluctuations. The injection-molding grade with a ten percent carbon fiber reinforcement can be used within a wide temperature range between -30 and +180°C. It is easy to process because of its low viscosity and therefore its very good flow properties. The new grade is now globally available.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-229.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-226" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-226.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF working toward circularity in recycling of mattresses||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-226.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P226_BASF_PU_Recycling-3:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 29, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF working toward circularity in recycling of mattresses</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF has developed a chemical recycling process for used mattresses and is starting pilot tests at the Schwarzheide site in Brandenburg, Germany. The materials from old mattresses are to be recycled in such a way that they can be used for the production of new mattresses. “The target is to recover the raw materials with a quality comparable to that of non-recycled/virgin raw materials”, says Shankara Keelapandal, Business Management Isocyanates Europe. In doing so, BASF is breaking new ground and responding to the raised expectations regarding sustainability of the foam and mattress industry as well as those of consumers. It is an important step to possibly re-enter post-consumer waste back into product lifecycles.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-226.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-228" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-228.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||The first semi-finished part made of Ultramid® Advanced N||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-228.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P228_Teaser_Ultramid_Advanced_N_13269:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="lazyload rendition" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 26, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">The first semi-finished part made of Ultramid® Advanced N</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF has now developed Ultramid<sup>®</sup> Advanced N5H UN, a polyphthalamide (PPA) that can be manufactured into semi-finished parts by extrusion. The plastics company GEHR, Mannheim, Germany is using the new PPA to produce extruded stock shapes with a diameter of 50 millimeters. Ultramid<sup>®</sup> Advanced N offers excellent mechanics at elevated temperatures due to its semi-aromatic chemical structure. It shows excellent resistance to chemicals and hydrolysis, even in aggressive environments, as well as good sliding friction properties –&nbsp; and all this at temperatures above 100°C. Due to its low water uptake its mechanical properties remain stable over a wide temperature range. Even in humid environments, the long-chain high-performance material shows a dimensional stability that belongs to the highest of all polyamides.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-228.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">MasterFlow 9800: bulk supplied high strength grout for sustainable and efficient offshore grouting operations</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Master Builders Solutions<sup>®</sup> supports the development of wind power as a climate-friendly source of energy by offering our most advanced Roads are subjected to even higher loads, usually requiring replacement after ten to twelve years. An innovative bitumen additive from BASF has been designed to make roads last longer. BASF has spent several years developing the additive together with the Institute of Highway Engineering in Aachen, and is now available under the name B2Last<sup>®</sup>. The product’s aim is already reflected in its name: “bitumen to last”. “We expect an extension of the average road life span by up to 50 percent,” said Dag Wiebelhaus, responsible Head of Product Innovation in the Monomers operating division.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-225.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-210" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-210.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF’s new virtual AUVOTs display automotive coatings in the digital world||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-210.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/AUVOT_LIT-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="lazyload rendition" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 19, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF’s new virtual AUVOTs display automotive coatings in the digital world</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Automotive paint is one of the most complex color themes. To gain a realistic impression of colors, effects and surfaces on a complete car during the early design phase, the designers of BASF’s Coatings division have developed virtual “AUVOT” (Automotive Vehicles of Trends) shapes. BASF’s AUVOTs display the interaction between color and geometry, and the importance of light in the digital world of automotive coatings. They help automotive manufacturers understand the impact of color in industrial design in one shape with two distinct sides.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-210.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-223" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-223.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Kurt Bock elected as new chairman of the Supervisory Board of BASF SE||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-223.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P223_KB_1-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 18, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Kurt Bock elected as new chairman of the Supervisory Board of BASF SE</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, Germany – June 18, 2020 – The Supervisory Board of BASF SE has elected Dr. Kurt Bock as the new chairman of the Supervisory Board of BASF SE. Bock had previously been elected to the Supervisory Board of BASF SE by the Annual Shareholders’ Meeting as a shareholder representative. The term runs until the end of the Annual Shareholders’ Meeting in 2024.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-223.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-214" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-214.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF’s battery materials plants in Europe advance as planned ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-214.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P214_06-02_2020_Harjavalta:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 15, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF’s battery materials plants in Europe advance as planned </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Preparations and construction of BASF’s battery materials plants in Europe are advancing as planned. After the casting of the foundation for its precursor cathode active material (PCAM) plant in Harjavalta, Finland, BASF has officially started construction. In addition, BASF has secured the construction permits to begin building the new cathode active material (CAM) plant in Schwarzheide, Germany. Despite the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic, the multi-step investment project is progressing as scheduled for a 2022 start-up. BASF remains steadfast in its commitment to provide a reliable and sustainable local supply to cell producers and OEM customers in Europe.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-214.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div of the coronavirus, the Annual Shareholders’ Meeting of BASF&nbsp;SE on Thursday, June 18, 2020, will be held as an entirely virtual meeting.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 10, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF supports search for active ingredients to combat coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">As part of its “Helping Hands” initiative, BASF is not just donating disinfectant and protective face masks. The company is also providing support worldwide to academic research groups in their search for a suitable active ingredient to treat patients infected with the coronavirus. “We do not develop active pharmaceutical ingredients, but BASF has more than 150 years of experience in researching substances. This means we have the knowledge and large substance libraries with a wide variety of active ingredients,” said Dr.&nbsp;Peter Eckes, President Bioscience Research at BASF. The company has also developed its own computer programs to design molecules and has its own supercomputer called Quriosity. “Leveraging these enormous research capabilities is another way we can contribute to combating the coronavirus pandemic,” said Eckes. The company is taking multiple approaches in these efforts.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-218.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-217" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-217.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Joint Press Release - BASF SE and ExxonMobil Introduce a New Gas Treating Technology Aimed at Helping Customers Lower Sulfur and Overall CO2 emissions: OASE sulfexx ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-217.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P217e_OASE_sulfexx_ExxonMobil_BASF_300dpi:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 9, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Joint Press Release - BASF SE and ExxonMobil Introduce a New Gas Treating Technology Aimed at Helping Customers Lower Sulfur and Overall CO2 emissions: OASE sulfexx </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">LUDWIGSHAFEN, Germany and HOUSTON, Texas, USA – <a href="https://www.basf.com/us/en.html">BASF SE</a> and <a href="https://www.exxonmobilchemical.com/en/catalysts-and-technology-licensing">ExxonMobil Catalysts and Licensing LLC</a> have released a new highly energy efficient amine gas treatment technology named OASE<sup>®</sup> sulfexx™. The technology is based on a new proprietary amine-based solvent that selectively removes hydrogen sulfide (H<sub>2</sub>S), while minimizing the co-absorption of carbon dioxide (CO<sub>2</sub>) from gas streams.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-217.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-220" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-220.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Purchase of commercial paper by the Bank of England is part of BASF’s existing commercial paper program||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-220.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 8, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Purchase of commercial paper by the Bank of England is part of BASF’s existing commercial paper program</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen – June 8, 2020 – In April 2020, the Bank of England accepted BASF as an eligible counterparty with a solid A-rating. BASF subsequently issued commercial paper to the Bank of England in the amount of £1 billion maturing in March 2021. This transaction is based on the initial terms of the Covid Corporate Financing Facility (CCFF), which was published by the UK Treasury on March 17, 2020 to provide liquidity in the financial markets.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-220.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-168" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-168.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||New mode of action classification for BASF herbicide Luximo®  ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-168.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P168e_Farmer_UK_Crop_Wheat:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="lazyload rendition" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 2, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">New mode of action classification for BASF herbicide Luximo®  </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Limburgerhof, Germany – In the ongoing effort to combat weed resistance, unique modes of action are critical to protecting crops and the food sources of a growing population. Researchers at BASF dedicated to finding viable solutions to this challenge arrived at Luximo<sup>®</sup>, a herbicide which has received the first new mode of action classification from the Herbicide Resistance Action Committee (HRAC) since 1985.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-168.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-213" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-213.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||The current photo - BASF started piling of the first plants of its smart Verbund project in Zhanjiang, Guangdong ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-213.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P213e_photo_piling_Verbund_Zhanjiang_300dpi:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="lazyload rendition" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 2, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">The current photo - BASF started piling of the first plants of its smart Verbund project in Zhanjiang, Guangdong </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">On May 30, BASF kicked off the piling work of the first plants of its smart Verbund project in Zhanjiang, Guangdong, China. This came as another important milestone in the development of the company’s US$10 billion investment project since its official commencement in November 2019. The first plants will produce engineering plastics and thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU) to serve the increasing needs of various growth industries in the southern China market and throughout Asia.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-213.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-215" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-215.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF announces 25th anniversary of APG® production at Düsseldorf site||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-215.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 2, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF announces 25th anniversary of APG® production at Düsseldorf site</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF announces the 25th anniversary of producing alkyl polyglycosides (APG<a name="_Hlk41472646" id="_Hlk41472646"></a><sup>®</sup>s) at the production site in Düsseldorf-Holthausen. Derived from the renewable raw materials starch and vegetal oils, APGs are all-round surfactants that offer mildness and foam quality for a broad variety of formulation concepts in personal care and home care as well as in industrial applications. Since its inauguration in April 1995 the plant has managed to produce more than one million tons of APG. Initially built and operated by Henkel KGaA, the ownership of the plant switched to Cognis in 2000, which was acquired by BASF in 2011.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/06/p-20-215.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/05/p-20-209" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/05/p-20-209.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF issues €2.0 billion in corporate bonds||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/05/p-20-209.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 29, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF issues €2.0 billion in corporate bonds</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a name="_Hlk41317645" id="_Hlk41317645"></a>On May&nbsp;28, 2020, BASF successfully placed bonds with a total volume of €2.0 billion on the capital market. The first tranche has an issue volume of €1.0 billion, a term of 3&nbsp;years and an annual coupon of 0.101% and will be used for general corporate financing purposes. With the second tranche, BASF issued its first green bond. This has a term of 7 years, a volume of €1.0 billion and an annual coupon of 0.25%; it serves to finance sustainable products and projects. BASF was able to secure attractive conditions thanks to its very solid financial structure and its leading sustainability position.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/05/p-20-209.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/05/p-20-208" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/05/p-20-208.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF startup incubator celebrates second anniversary and faCellitate product launch||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/05/p-20-208.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P208e_faCellitate_plate_web:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 28, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF startup incubator celebrates second anniversary and faCellitate product launch</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Mannheim, May 28, 2020. Two years after the foundation of the Chemovator GmbH, the first Life Science Venture Team “faCellitate” is now ready to launch their first product line. BIOFLOAT™ are surface coatings for consumables in cell culture. The benefit: The cells can grow under conditions close to their natural environment, making laboratory results more reliable and reproducible than before. “In the long run, it is possible to increase predictability and efficiency of preclinical cell culture models, reduce animal studies and reduce the high costs for research, drug development, and toxicological studies.” reveals Dr. Véronique Schwartz, team leader and specialist in polymer chemistry.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 27, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF updates the Abbreviated Component Maintenance Manuals for its Deoxo™ ozone and ozone/VOC converter portfolios </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF announced today that it has<a name="_Hlk33107046" id="_Hlk33107046"></a> updated its Abbreviated Component Maintenance Manuals (ACMMs) for the Deoxo™ ozone converters and ozone/VOC converters portfolio, with the release of revised ACMMs for the Airbus A320 airplane platform and the Airbus A330/A340 airplane platform. The updated ACMMs redefine the test procedures and service methods for maintaining the converters, to ensure continued industry-leading performance of its ozone converters. Proper testing includes functional checks of both ozone conversion efficiency and pressure drop for air transiting through the converter. BASF encourages airline operators to check with their current MRO (Maintenance Repair and Overhaul) service provider to ensure compliance with the updated ACMMs.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/05/p-20-184.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/05/p-20-205" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/05/p-20-205.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Joint news release - BASF and Red Avenue New Materials Group collaborate to produce certified compostable co-polyester (PBAT) in China||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/05/p-20-205.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P205e_Pressebild_18x13_ecoflex-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 27, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Joint news release - BASF and Red Avenue New Materials Group collaborate to produce certified compostable co-polyester (PBAT) in China</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, Germany/Shanghai, China, May 28, 2020: BASF and Red Avenue New Materials Group have signed a joint agreement that grants Red Avenue New Materials Group the license to produce and sell certified compostable aliphatic-aromatic co-polyester (PBAT) according to high BASF quality standards. For that purpose, Red Avenue New Materials Group will build a 60,000 metric tons PBAT plant in Shanghai, using BASF`s process technology in exchange for the access to raw material from this plant which BASF will sell as ecoflex®. Production at the new plant will start in 2022 and supply the market of biopolymers.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/05/p-20-205.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/05/p-20-207" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/05/p-20-207.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Technology for SLS by Master Builders Solutions® revolutionizes concrete screed construction ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/05/p-20-207.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P207e_BASF_Rohdatenvorschau_Polen_DSC3536_300dpi:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 27, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Technology for SLS by Master Builders Solutions® revolutionizes concrete screed construction </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">The traditional cementitious dry-mix screed method is time consuming and cost intensive. The experts of Master Builders Solutions have therefore developed the innovative Technology for SLS that supersedes conventional techniques: it is less time and labor intensive, reduces construction costs and CO<sub>2</sub> emissions and meets the highest quality standards. Application is easy and quick and doesn’t require special skills of the applicator.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">trinamiX Enables the Miniaturization of CO2 Measurement Systems  for Mobile Air Quality Monitoring and Capnography</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><b>May 26, 2020 – Ludwigshafen, Germany</b>&nbsp;– <a name="_Hlk41322248" id="_Hlk41322248"></a>trinamiX GmbH, a leader in 3D imaging and infrared sensing technologies, today announced the company’s proprietary lead selenide (PbSe) near-infrared detectors can be effectively integrated into challenging applications for carbon dioxide (CO<sub>2</sub>) measurement. Those include medical breath gas analysis (capnography) and mobile air quality monitoring. class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF introduces ZEAL™ Fluidized Catalytic Cracking (FCC) additive to deliver more propylene for refiners </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF announces the commercial launch of ZEAL™ which is a new Fluid Catalytic Cracking (FCC) additive product designed to enhance the production of light olefins in FCC units that process resid or gasoil feedstocks. ZEAL is the latest product development that will enable refiners to quickly respond to the increasing shift to petrochemical feedstocks. ZEAL has been optimized to deliver superior propylene yields while maintaining the base catalyst performance.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img data-v-5db4dc0c="">Master Builders Solutions announces the launch of Ucrete CS heavy-duty color-stable flooring for enhanced esthetics</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">The innovative color-stable Ucrete CS flooring system from Master Builders Solutions<sup>®</sup> is being launched across Europe in the first half of 2020. Ucrete CS builds on 50 years of excellence in heavy-duty industrial flooring. ‘CS’ stands for ‘color stable’ and describes the system’s new benefit: enhanced color stability. This feature is achieved by advanced UV stability, reducing yellowing, even if the floor is exposed to intensive UV light for many years. In addition, the discoloration of the surface due to chemical stress is minimized. Thanks to the system’s advanced color stability, Ucrete CS sets the new benchmark for esthetic requirements in highly challenging environments, especially in the food and beverage sector.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/05/p-20-160.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/05/p-20-201" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/05/p-20-201.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF embraces personalization in cosmetics||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/05/p-20-201.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 14, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF embraces personalization in cosmetics</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><b>Düsseldorf-Holthausen, Germany – May 14, 2020 </b>– More and more people consider beauty and care routines as a key to individualization and diversity. BASF is meeting the growing consumer expectation for cosmetic products that reflect the individual needs and nuances of their everyday world with a winning new concept for personalized cosmetics. “Individual expression is among the most important megatrends currently shaping the cosmetics industry on a global scale,” said Jason McAlpine, Vice President Business Management Personal Care Solutions Europe. “That’s a balancing act for cosmetic manufacturers because it means that their products need to be effective for many while responding to the distinct wishes and needs of the individual. With our ingredients and formulation expertise, we are able to help our customers meet this challenge.” BASF’s new concept is based upon diverse chassis formulations for Face and Hair Care that, when combined with high performance boosters, enable consumers to create their own tailor-made products in harmony with their personal needs.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/05/p-20-201.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/05/p-20-196" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/05/p-20-196.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||New site agreement for BASF SE signed||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/05/p-20-196.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 6, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">New site agreement for BASF SE signed</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">The company management and employee representatives at BASF SE today&nbsp;(May&nbsp;6, 2020) signed a new site agreement. Entitled “Living the new BASF together!”, the agreement applies to the approximately 34,000&nbsp;employees of BASF SE at the Ludwigshafen site. It will run for five and a half years (from June&nbsp;1,&nbsp;2020 until December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2025) and replaces the current site agreement, which would have expired at the end of 2020.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/05/p-20-196.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/05/p-20-198" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/05/p-20-198.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF introduces Luviset® 360: a new styling polymer for exceptional textures and very strong but flexible hold||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/05/p-20-198.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 5, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF introduces Luviset® 360: a new styling polymer for exceptional textures and very strong but flexible hold</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF launches its new styling polymer Luviset<sup>®</sup> 360 providing an efficient styling performance in six dimensions: The innovative product offers strong, flexible and long-lasting hold as well as low flaking. It supports anti-pollution claims and allows for new textures. Luviset 360 is perfectly suited for producing high viscous styling products with no or low movement inside the package. It has been designed for a wide range of final hair styling products such as gels, creams and waxes.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/05/p-20-198.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/05/p-20-189" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/05/p-20-189.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF is the largest provider of ingredients for natural cosmetics ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/05/p-20-189.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 4, 2020</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF is the largest provider of ingredients for natural cosmetics </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Five active ingredients by BASF for cosmetics and body care products have for the first time been approved as organic according to COSMOS-standard. This includes the active ingredients Dulcemin<sup>®</sup> from sweet almond seed flour, Lipofructyl<sup>®</sup> on the basis of Argan oil as well as the skin care ingredient Elestan<sup>®</sup> extracted from the leaves of the West African Manilkara tree.&nbsp;</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/05/p-20-189.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/04/p-20-191" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/04/p-20-191.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF conference call on first quarter 2020 - BASF Group shows resilience amid corona crisis with diversified portfolio and financial solidity ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2020/04/p-20-191.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/Fahnen_A16_0008_20171:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp;
