This is currently in develop-ment and is designed to meet the needs of additive manufacturing users, ad-vanced manufacturing as well as traditional manufacturing markets. The WAV™ (Wave Applied Voxel) process was created with the end-user firmly in mind in an effort to solve trapped volume issues of within current liquid resin-based technol-ogies.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-213.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-214" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-214.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF 3D Printing Solutions and Origin collaborate with foot-wear manufacturer ECCO||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-214.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P214_Vollbild-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="lazyload rendition" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 20, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF 3D Printing Solutions and Origin collaborate with foot-wear manufacturer ECCO</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF 3D Printing Solutions and strategic partner Origin, an open-platform addi-tive-manufacturing printer provider are collaborating with ECCO, a footwear man-ufacturer to develop a wholly new approach to footwear production. The Danish ECCO Group, an innovative global manufacturer of high-quality footwear, is us-ing the Origin platform with BASF’s Ultracur3D material at its R &amp; D Center in Denmark headquarters. The initial results demonstrate outstanding detail accura-cy and mechanical stability with Origin’s unique programmable polymerization process (P3).</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-214.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-215" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-215.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF partners with European Union’s BIM project “SPHERE” for sustainable construction||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-215.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/Teaser_P215:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="lazyload rendition" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 20, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF partners with European Union’s BIM project “SPHERE” for sustainable construction</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF is a partner of the European Union’s SPHERE project. The project aims at developing a digital-twin software platform to enable the virtual replication of buildings in order to increase their energy efficiency, optimize their life cycle, and reduce costs. The ‘virtual twin’ will incorporate a wide range of data on construction method, design, production of construction materials, structural elements, as well as the construction process. The project has been allocated €7.4 million of EU funding; its total volume is €12.8 million.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-215.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-221" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-221.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF at IUPAC 2019: engaging in R&amp;D for sustainable agriculture ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-221.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P221_7283_fin-2:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 20, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF at IUPAC 2019: engaging in R&amp;D for sustainable agriculture </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ghent, Belgium – BASF will present its latest R&amp;D highlights for the agricultural industry at the 14th International Congress of Crop Protection Chemistry being held from May 19-24 in Ghent, Belgium by the International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry (IUPAC). More than 1500 crop health specialists from 51 countries are expected to join the congress this year. Amongst them are world-renowned speakers, academics, policymakers and experts from the agricultural industry. BASF scientists will share their expertise in more than 50 lectures and poster sessions. At the accompanying exhibition BASF will also present a selection of R&amp;D innovations, such as insights into the development of the latest fungicide active ingredient Revysol®, which is designed to meet high regulatory standards and to deliver an outstanding biological performance.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF and Glycosyn sign strategic partnership to improve gut health with human milk oligosaccharides</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BOSTON, MA, U.S. / Ludwigshafen, Germany, May 16, 2019 – BASF and Glycosyn signed a partnership agreement for the development and commercialization of human milk oligosaccharides (HMOs) for broad use in dietary supplements, functional nutrition, and medical food. The strategic partnership includes exclusive license of Glycosyn´s patent portfolio for gut health beyond infant nutrition to BASF. The agreement aims to improve gastrointestinal health in adolescents and adults, along with broadening the applications of HMO for further health conditions.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-210.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-211" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-211.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Low abrasion titanium dioxide batch for the white pigmentation of polyamide yarns||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-211.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 16, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Low abrasion titanium dioxide batch for the white pigmentation of polyamide yarns</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Titanium dioxide pigmentation is required in many applications of polyamide yarns. The customary rutile and anatase white pigments used for this roughen the surfaces of the manufactured threads and fibers. As a result of this, abrasive wear increases, particularly in the manufacture of velour carpets or flock fibers. The consequences for the spinning machine and also for further processing are higher stress on the yarn-guiding elements and a faster wear of the cutting tools, which leads to high wear costs.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-211.html" class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Introducing X-Swift: Swiftly shaping the athleisure shoe market with material innovations and the latest footwear technology </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Guangzhou, China – May 15, 2019 – BASF, Longterm Concept, and Gu Guoyi have collaborated to develop X-Swift - a newly designed athleisure shoe that showcases four outstanding BASF advanced material innovations fused into one shoe with the latest footwear automation technology. TPO sheets are widely used as roofing membranes in commercial buildings and other structures as a more environmentally friendly alternative for high-performance waterproofing.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-204.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-206" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-206.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Joint press release by BASF and Volkswagen - Application phase for the seventh BASF and Volkswagen“Science Award Electrochemistry” has begun||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-206.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P206_4804_Research_into_high-performance_battery_materials-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 14, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Joint press release by BASF and Volkswagen - Application phase for the seventh BASF and Volkswagen“Science Award Electrochemistry” has begun</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen / Wolfsburg (Germany), May 14, 2019 – The BASF and Volkswagen international “Science Award Electrochemistry” is now in its seventh year. Starting today, scientists of excellence from all over the world may apply online at www.science-award.com. The website also explains the participation conditions, procedure and selection process. Deadline for applications: June 30, 2019. Contributions submitted will be assessed by a jury comprising experts from BASF, Volkswagen and representatives from the scientific community. The award ceremony takes place in Wolfsburg on November 12, 2019.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-206.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-197" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-197.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Connecting strengths||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-197.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P197e_Pressefoto_Ultramid_Advanced_T2000:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 13, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Connecting strengths</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF is further extending its polyphthalamide (PPA) portfolio: At Chinaplas 2019, Guangzhou, the new PPA Ultramid® Advanced T2000 will be introduced to the market. The compound group based on PA 6T/66 combines excellent mechanical with dielectric strength at high temperatures - a combination which is particularly needed for connectors in the electrical and electronics (E&amp;E) industry. Due to its partially aromatic chemical structure, Ultramid® Advanced T2000 is the ideal solution for parts that require high, constant stiffness and strength over a broad temperature range in combination with resistance to heat and humidity as well as optional flame-retardant (FR) properties.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-197.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-205" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-205.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Joint News Release - BASF signs exclusive contract with Lactips to market bio-based and biodegradable films for home care as well as industrial  and institutional cleaning applications||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-205.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 13, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Joint News Release - BASF signs exclusive contract with Lactips to market bio-based and biodegradable films for home care as well as industrial  and institutional cleaning applications</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, Germany – May 13, 2019 – BASF and Lactips signed an exclusive contract to market Lactips’ water-soluble, bio-based and fully biodegradable material. This long-term partnership supports BASF’s strategy to leverage sustainable solutions to drive business growth.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-205.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-209" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-209.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||The journey from BASF-employee to a founder||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-209.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P209e_Chemovator_BASF_Inkubator_Chemovator_Birthday_Party_Pitch_BOXLAB:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 13, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">The journey from BASF-employee to a founder</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Mannheim, May 13, 2019 – What do modular construction, coworking and polymeres have in common? They are all part of BASF! To be precise, part of Chemovator GmbH. Chemowhat? The internal incubator of BASF turns unconventional ideas which carry usually high risks and lie outside the core business of BASF into investable business models. Why? The successful development of unconventional ideas requires atypical approaches that are difficult to implement in the classic corporate environment.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-209.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-196" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-196.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Roll it up!||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-196.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P196_Ultrason_Krempel-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 8, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Roll it up!</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">A simple yet technically sophisticated household item shows how playfulness, design and functionality can be combined with engineering plastics: the foldable trivet Krempel® from oha-design, Germany. This kitchen helper consists of four flexible, flat plastic strips, which are connected to each other with rivet joints. By pushing or pulling the original flat shape, it can be turned inside out or bent in a variety of ways to create stable, three-dimensional shapes like a circle, pillow or fish. The company oha-design is now using the high-performance plastic Ultrason® P to produce the extremely loadable plastic strips. The polyphenylsulfone (PPSU) from BASF ensures that the trivet always retains its shape, is flame retardant and can be easily cleaned in a dishwasher.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-196.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-202" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-202.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Personnel Changes at BASF Agricultural Solutions||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-202.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 7, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Personnel Changes at BASF Agricultural Solutions</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Dr. Dirk Voeste (56) has been appointed to the position of Senior Vice President, responsible for Global Product Safety and Registration in BASF’s Agricultural Solutions division effective May 1, 2019. He succeeds Dr. Jürgen Oldeweme (63) who retired at the same time.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-202.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-200" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-200.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Elastollan – a real all-rounder ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-200.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P200_Pressefoto_1_Spindeln_Techtextil_2019-3:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 6, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Elastollan – a real all-rounder </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">At the international trade fair for technical textiles and nonwovens from May 14–17, 2019 in Frankfurt, BASF will be showing its expertise in fabrics, films, nonwovens, yarns and hot-melt adhesives – all based on Elastollan®, the company’s thermoplastic polyurethane. Due to its high elasticity and excellent mechanical strength, the plastic is suitable for the production of a wide range of materials for the textile industry.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-200.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-191" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-191.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF Group increases sales; earnings  below prior-year quarter, in line with expectations ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-191.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/A16_0008_2017:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 3, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF Group increases sales; earnings  below prior-year quarter, in line with expectations </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">“In the first quarter of 2019, BASF Group sales rose by 3% year on year to €16.2 billion,” said Dr. Martin Brudermüller, Chairman of the Board of Executive Directors of BASF SE, at the company’s Annual Shareholders’ Meeting held at Congress Center Rosengarten in Mannheim, Germany. Compared with the first quarter of 2018, income from operations (EBIT) before special items declined by €549 million to €1.7 billion. “As expected, this is primarily due to the considerably lower contributions from the Materials and Chemicals segments. In these segments, we had exceptionally high isocyanates margins and strong cracker margins in the first quarter of the previous year,” said Brudermüller. EBIT before special items also declined considerably in Other and the Nutrition &amp; Care segment, while earnings matched the level of the previous first quarter in the Surface Technologies segment. By contrast, the Agricultural Solutions and Industrial Solutions segments recorded a considerable improvement in earnings.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-191.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-198" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-198.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Jürgen Hambrecht as Chairman of the Supervisory Board confirmed||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-198.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 3, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Jürgen Hambrecht as Chairman of the Supervisory Board confirmed</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">In its constitutive meeting, the new Supervisory Board of BASF SE has confirmed Dr. Jürgen Hambrecht as Chairman of the Supervisory Board. By sponsoring this initiative, the Automotive Refinish business unit of BASF’s Coatings division supports young talents, inspires them, and makes them excited about the spray painting profession in particular. Initiated in 1950, trainees and young skilled workers from all over the world compete with each other at the WorldSkills and measure their skills in numerous categories ever since.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-195.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-199" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-199.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF and LetterOne complete merger of Wintershall and DEA||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/05/p-19-199.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 1, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF and LetterOne complete merger of Wintershall and DEA</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, Germany – May 1, 2019 – Following the approval of all relevant authorities, BASF and LetterOne have successfully completed the merger of Wintershall and DEA. class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF’s light stabilizer for greenhouse films helps Vietnam farmers increase crop yields, reduce waste</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Hong Kong – April 30, 2019 – BASF and Tân Hùng Cơ Masterbatch Manufacture Co. are working to help farmers increase their yields and save resources with more durable greenhouse films. Tân Hùng Cơ, a leading manufacturer of additive masterbatches for plastic films in Vietnam, is now using BASF’s plastic additive Tinuvin® NOR™ 371 to increase durability and lifespan of plastic greenhouse films made from low density polyethylene. With Tinuvin NOR 371, greenhouse films can withstand weathering for at least three to four years.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/04/p-19-188.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/04/p-19-186" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/04/p-19-186.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF invests in silicate-based specialty chemicals business ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/04/p-19-186.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">April 25, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF invests in silicate-based specialty chemicals business </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Düsseldorf-Holthausen – April 25, 2019 – BASF is investing a mid-range double-digit euro million sum in the modernization of its silica plant at the Düsseldorf-Holthausen site. On the same day, BASF will publish its Quarterly Statement and news release for the first quarter 2019 at 7:00 a.m. (CEST).</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/04/p-19-189.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/04/p-19-178" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/04/p-19-178.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF invests in quantum computing startup Zapata Computing||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/04/p-19-178.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">April 17, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF invests in quantum computing startup Zapata Computing</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, Germany, April 17, 2019 – BASF Venture Capital is joining a group of prominent investors in the Series A investment round of Zapata Computing, Inc. Headquartered in Cambridge, Massachusetts, Zapata is developing both a powerful software platform as well as specific applications for Global 1000 companies to effectively utilize a range of emerging quantum computing hardware. By investing in Zapata, BASF Venture Capital supports BASF’s strategic goal to take advantage of the opportunities that digitalization offers along the entire value chain. Quantum computing will enable BASF experts to very efficiently investigate complex questions and it will further shorten the time it takes to launch new products. Zapata, which was spun-out of Harvard University in 2017, will use the funds raised to expand its scientific team and further develop its software platform to meet growing customer demand. BASF joins a round led by Comcast Ventures and Prelude Ventures, together with new and existing investors including Pitango Ventures, Pillar Venture Capital, and The Engine.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/04/p-19-178.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/04/p-19-179" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/04/p-19-179.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF expands production of polyacrylamide powder in Nanjing, China||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/04/p-19-179.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">April 16, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF expands production of polyacrylamide powder in Nanjing, China</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Nanjing, China – April 16, 2019 – During the first quarter of 2019, BASF has successfully ramped up commercial production of its new production line for polyacrylamide powder at its wholly-owned site in Nanjing, China. The additional 20,000 metric tons per year capacity of polyacrylamide will support mining customers in Asia Pacific.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/04/p-19-179.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/04/p-19-184" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/04/p-19-184.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Qatargas and BASF sign gas treating technology license agreement for LNG trains||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/04/p-19-184.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">April 16, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Qatargas and BASF sign gas treating technology license agreement for LNG trains</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, Germany and Doha, Qatar – Qatargas Operating Company Limited (Qatargas), acting on behalf of Qatar Petroleum, and BASF SE have signed a technology license agreement for the North Field Expansion Project in Qatar. Under the agreement, BASF is providing two technologies, one for gas removal and another for gas treatment, these technologies are marketed under the brand OASE® and FlexsorbTM for four new Liquefied Natural Gas (LNG) trains in Qatar. Gas removal and treatment technology is an integral part in the production of LNG. It removes impurities such as carbon dioxide (CO2) and hydrogen sulfide (H2S), from the natural gas stream to enable the subsequent liquefaction process to take place.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/04/p-19-184.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/04/p-19-185" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/04/p-19-185.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Master Builders Solutions® presents Ucrete flooring systems at IFFA 2019||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/04/p-19-185.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/Ucrete_IFFA_1200x627_EN:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">April 16, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Master Builders Solutions® presents Ucrete flooring systems at IFFA 2019</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">The Master Builders Solutions experts from BASF will showcase Ucrete, the high performance hygienic flooring system at the world’s leading trade fair of the meat industry IFFA from May 4 to 9 in Frankfurt am Main, Germany. After the start-up in 2020, BASF’s global annual nameplate capacity of AEOA will be more than 110,000 metric tons per year at its production facilities in Ludwigshafen, Germany; Geismar, USA; and Nanjing, China.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/04/p-19-181.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Paris, France – April 2, 2019 – At this year’s in-cosmetics in Paris, from April 2 to 4, BASF’s Care Creations™ focuses on trends like responsible living or reliable sun care cosmetics which are reflecting consumer needs and driving the personal care industry. With new need-based solutions, proving its expertise in actives and sun care as well as its commitment to sustainability, BASF supports its customers staying at the pulse of the personal care market and responding to consumer requirements. “In today’s increasingly fragmented personal care market, consumers expect more than excellent cosmetic products. data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/04/p-19-177" data-tracking-value="news||Rambutan Program: BASF launches bioactives from responsible beauty program||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/04/p-19-177.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div data-v-5db4dc0c="">Rambutan Program: BASF launches bioactives from responsible beauty program</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">At this year’s trade fair in-cosmetics, BASF’s Care Creations™ launches three new active ingredients derived from its Rambutan Program, a socially and environmentally responsible supply chain for sustainable bioactives production. Working in close cooperation with partners in Vietnam, BASF sources the ingredients, which are extracted from the rambutan tree (Nephelium lappaceum), from the first organically certified rambutan gardens in Vietnam. With its program, BASF creates a positive impact on Vietnamese rural society by upcycling different parts of the tree, other than the fruit, and at the same time offering incomes above the average, ensuring gender equity while guaranteeing safer working conditions and providing health insurance. It also helps manufacturers of hair and skin care products to respond to the growing trend of responsible beauty.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/04/p-19-177.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/04/p-19-175" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/04/p-19-175.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Master Builders Solutions® presents MasterTop 1327-20dB at Architect@Work roadshow in Stockholm||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/04/p-19-175.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P175_RS489_CF010139-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="lazyload rendition" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">April 1, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Master Builders Solutions® presents MasterTop 1327-20dB at Architect@Work roadshow in Stockholm</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">As part of the European roadshow Architect@Work, the Master Builders Solutions® experts will present MasterTop 1327-20dB at Stockholmsmässan in Stockholm, Sweden, on April 3 and 4, booth number 7. This new pilot plant facility for catalyst and process development will be operated by the global research unit Process Research &amp; Chemical Engineering. It houses highly automated experimental facilities for efficient process development and testing of new process catalysts. The highlights of the modernized lab include modular construction of the testing facilities, the use of digital technologies to better visualize and manage the pilot plant facilities, and a digitalized working environment.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-167.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-170" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-170.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF’s Colors and Effects® Brand and the Pantone Color Institute™ Complete Color of the Year 2019 Conference World Tour||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-170.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">March 25, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF’s Colors and Effects® Brand and the Pantone Color Institute™ Complete Color of the Year 2019 Conference World Tour</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">With a joint presentation on March 28, BASF’s Colors and Effects® Brand and the Pantone Color Institute™ will complete their joint tour for the Color of the Year 2019 collaboration at SPE, the Society of Plastics and Engineers European Additives and Color Conference, in Frankfurt, Germany. In a series of presentations in North America, Asia, and Europe, BASF and Pantone are highlighting a collection of plastic designs inspired by the Pantone Color of the Year 2019, PANTONE 16-1546 Living Coral. Supporting performance as well as aesthetic appearance, the collection features a selection of Colors &amp; Effects pigments that accentuate color, finish and design all while meeting versatile industry requirements.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-170.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-164" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-164.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Innovative concepts from BASF Color Solutions simplify the recoloring of regrind for plastic recycled materials||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-164.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">March 14, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Innovative concepts from BASF Color Solutions simplify the recoloring of regrind for plastic recycled materials</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Driven by the desire for closed material cycles and the economical use of resources, the recoloring of regrind for plastic recycled materials is gaining further importance, especially the economic reuse in the same application. The goal is to achieve a quality comparable to that of the coloration of new materials. This remains a challenge in particular due to the strongly fluctuating color shades of the regenerated material as well as aging phenomena of the used plastic. As a result, up until now a separate batch had to be adjusted for each batch of recycled material in order to achieve the target color shade and the desired material properties.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-164.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-129" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-129.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF opens a new site for digitalization in Spain||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-129.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P129_BASF_MADRID_new_site_for_digitalization:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">March 12, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF opens a new site for digitalization in Spain</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">In February 2019, BASF has founded the new company BASF Digital Solutions S.L. located in Madrid, Spain to drive forward the digital transformation of BASF group and develop innovative IT solutions. BASF plans to grow the center to more than 300 digital specialists within the next years.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-129.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-161" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-161.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF expands innovation scope in Asia Pacific ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-161.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/20190312_BASF_innovation_new_facilities-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">March 12, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF expands innovation scope in Asia Pacific </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Shanghai, China – March 12, 2019 – BASF is enhancing its regional innovation capabilities with new facilities at the Innovation Campus Shanghai, to further strengthen collaboration with the automotive industry and to offer new process catalysts to the chemical industry. With an investment of approximately €34 million, the new 5,000-square-meter facilities include the Automotive Application Center and the Process Catalysis Research &amp; Development (R&amp;D) Center.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-161.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-162" 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF expands innovation scope in Asia Pacific with new facilities and new solutions </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Shanghai, China – March 12, 2019 – BASF is enhancing its regional innovation capabilities with new facilities at the Innovation Campus Shanghai, to further strengthen collaboration with the automotive industry and to offer new process catalysts to the chemical industry. With an investment of approximately €34 million, the new 5,000-square-meter facilities include the Automotive Application Center and the Process Catalysis Research &amp; Development (R&amp;D) Center.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-162.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-152" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-152.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Ultramid® is setting new standards for fuel cells||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-152.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P152_ultramid_brennstoffzelle-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">March 11, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ultramid® is setting new standards for fuel cells</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Which automotive drive system will become dominant in future? How can we achieve further reductions in energy consumption and emissions through new and improved powertrain concepts for cars? These and other questions are occupying the minds not only of car manufacturers but also of BASF, as the biggest chemical supplier to the automotive industry. Alongside the continued development of cars with more efficient internal combustion engines, chemistry is making an important contribution to a number of different electric drive concepts. Further progress is also being made in the field of fuel cells. In close cooperation with Joma-Polytec and Mercedes-Benz Fuel Cell, a subsidiary of Daimler AG, the engineering plastic Ultramid has successfully been used to manufacture a number of fuel cell system components. This innovative solution is being used as standard in the new Mercedes GLC F-CELL, which combines a fuel cell with a rechargeable lithium-ion battery.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-152.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-156" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-156.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF’s Colors &amp; Effects® brand introduces a cosmic blue stir-in pigment with the pioneering eXpand™ technology at the European Coatings Show||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-156.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">March 11, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF’s Colors &amp; Effects® brand introduces a cosmic blue stir-in pigment with the pioneering eXpand™ technology at the European Coatings Show</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF announced today the second stir-in pigment for automotive coatings with the pioneering eXpand!™ technology, enabling enhanced color depth, flop and sparkle. eXpand! Blue EH 6001, marketed under the Colors &amp; Effects® brand, is the second pigment with the pioneering stir-in technology resulting from the strategic partnership between BASF and Landa Labs. Within one year after the launch of eXpand! Red EH 3427, BASF will be exhibiting eXpand! Blue EH 6001 at booth 7A-724 at the European Coatings Show, held in Nuremberg, Germany, from March 19 until 21.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-156.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-151" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-151.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Concrete admixtures from Master Builders Solutions® optimize construction of Marienturm high-rise building in Frankfurt am Main||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-151.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P151_Marienturm1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">March 4, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Concrete admixtures from Master Builders Solutions® optimize construction of Marienturm high-rise building in Frankfurt am Main</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">The skyline of Frankfurt’s banking quarter has a new landmark: The 155-meter Marienturm tower, set for completion by the first quarter of 2019. The new high-rise office complex owes its quick ascend skyward also to the contribution of the MasterEase and Master X-Seed concrete admixtures from Master Builders Solutions®: After the foundation stone was laid in November 2016, the topping out ceremony was already held in August 2018. With a mere six days allocated to the construction of each of the structure’s 38 floors, time was pressing and demands on the concrete – some 39,500 cubic meters in all – accordingly high.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-151.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-146" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-146.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF gains approval for fungicide innovation Revysol® in Europe  ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-146.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P146_Revysol_EU_18x27:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">March 1, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF gains approval for fungicide innovation Revysol® in Europe  </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Limburgerhof, Germany – Farmers face many challenges in managing their farms profitably, including fewer products available to address increasing resistance. This reduction stems from steadily tightening regulations and the difficulty of finding new active ingredients. BASF’s fungicide innovation Revysol® is the first Isopropanol-Azole being introduced to the market. This makes its approval in the EU an important milestone for bringing farmers in Europe and around the globe a novel, high-performing tool to fight resistance and optimize their farm operations.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/03/p-19-146.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/02/p-19-154" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/02/p-19-154.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||New BASF vinyl monomer for UV curing products in the printing and coatings industry||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/02/p-19-154.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P154_BASF_VMOX_1-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">February 28, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">New BASF vinyl monomer for UV curing products in the printing and coatings industry</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">With vinyl methyl oxazolidinone (VMOX), BASF offers a new vinyl monomer in commercial quantities. VMOX is particularly suitable as a reactive diluent in UV curing inks and coatings, which can for example be used for digital UV printing. In these applications, the vinyl monomer has many technical benefits compared to conventional reactive diluents and allows innovative coatings formulations with a favorable toxicological profile. BASF will be presenting VMOX for the first time at the European Coatings Show, which will be held from March 19 to 21 in Nuremberg.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/02/p-19-154.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/02/p-19-141" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/02/p-19-141.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF posts slight increase in 2018 sales and decline in earnings due mainly to lower contributions from Chemicals||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/02/p-19-141.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/A16_0008_2017:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">February 26, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF posts slight increase in 2018 sales and decline in earnings due mainly to lower contributions from Chemicals</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF generated sales of €62.7 billion last year. This represents an increase of 2% compared with the previous year. Income from operations (EBIT) before special items declined to €6.4 billion, compared with €7.6 billion in the previous year. This was mainly attributable to the Chemicals segment, which accounted for around two-thirds of the total decline in earnings. Isocyanate margins fell sharply in the second half of the year. Furthermore, cracker margins were lower than expected in all regions in 2018.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/02/p-19-141.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/02/p-19-148" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/02/p-19-148.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Innovations for sustainable agriculture||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/02/p-19-148.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P148_Pipeline_Soy-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">February 26, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Innovations for sustainable agriculture</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF has expanded its pipeline of solutions for agriculture significantly and by 2028, will launch innovations with projected peak sales of more than €6 billion. The pipeline contains a wealth of chemical and biological crop protection products, seeds and traits, as well as digital solutions. This will further strengthen the company’s leading position in innovative and sustainable agriculture. BASF’s innovation pipeline demonstrates tangible progress based on continuous investment in research and development, the integration of acquired businesses and strong partnerships. In 2019, BASF will spend around €900 million on R&amp;D for agricultural solutions.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/02/p-19-148.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/02/p-19-147" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/02/p-19-147.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF and Linde Announce Collaboration Agreement for Natural Gas Processing Technology||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/02/p-19-147.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P147_Linde_Membranes_18x24-3:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">February 22, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF and Linde Announce Collaboration Agreement for Natural Gas Processing Technology</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, Germany and Pullach, Germany, February 22, 2019 - BASF and The Linde Group’s Engineering Division have agreed on a collaboration to serve natural gas processing applications using BASF’s adsorbent technology and Linde’s adsorption &amp; membrane technology. This collaboration brings together two leading companies in the fields of adsorbents, adsorption and membrane technology. With the combined capabilities of materials expertise from BASF and engineering expertise from Linde, the two companies are well positioned to expand their global leadership position in natural gas applications.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/02/p-19-147.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/02/p-19-135" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/02/p-19-135.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Green &amp; Light and BASF developed Elastoskin® based paper honeycomb car trunk floor||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/02/p-19-135.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">February 20, 2019</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Green &amp; Light and BASF developed Elastoskin® based paper honeycomb car trunk floor</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Green &amp; Light Automotive Components (Green &amp; Light), an innovative company based in China, has introduced an easy-to-clean surface covering for car trunk floors. Using polyurethane paper honeycomb technology, the trunk floor surface is covered by Elastoskin®, a polyurethane skin technology from BASF. Compared to conventional non-woven fabric surfaces, this newly developed product is easier to clean, offers great freedom in the design process, and has excellent aging and emission properties.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/02/p-19-135.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/02/p-19-139" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/02/p-19-139.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF’s investment into Alchemist Accelerator promotes digital innovations in the chemical industry||/global/en/media/news-releases/2019/02/p-19-139.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/4499_Concept_Car_RN30__plastic_part_using_digital_and_3D_printed_models-2:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="lazyload rendition" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp;
