Prismlab has developed a patented printing process that is characterized by a very high printing speed, high level of precision and lower printing costs. BASF’s venture investment will enable Prismlab to further accelerate its product development and innovation while strengthening its market reach to the global market.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/11/p-18-367.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/11/p-18-368" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/11/p-18-368.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Paul Smith to be appointed as CFO of Wintershall DEA||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/11/p-18-368.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">November 6, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Paul Smith to be appointed as CFO of Wintershall DEA</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, Germany, and London, UK, November 6, 2018 – BASF and LetterOne today announce their agreement to appoint Paul Smith as future Chief Financial Officer (CFO) and member of the Management Board of Wintershall DEA. The appointment will take effect on closing of the merger of Wintershall and DEA, which is expected in the first half of 2019 and is still subject to customary regulatory approvals.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/11/p-18-368.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/11/p-18-369" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/11/p-18-369.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF introduces AUROOM™, a platform for the digital visualization of automotive exterior colors||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/11/p-18-369.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/AUROOM_Icy_Sunshine:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="lazyload rendition" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">November 6, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF introduces AUROOM™, a platform for the digital visualization of automotive exterior colors</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">With AUROOM, BASF’s Coatings division introduces a digital platform which enables OEM designers to access a database of photo-realistic virtual car colors. BASF’s virtual colors capture all facets of automotive coatings including lightness flop, color flop and sparkling. By mapping these colors on car models, OEM designers can virtually paint every color proposal and gain realistic impressions of colors and effects on a complete car already in an early design phase. AUROOM will be a valuable tool for OEM designers to speed up and perfect the overall color design process as they are no longer solely dependent on physical samples that need to be painted and shipped. AUROOM provides further innovative features like real-time side by side comparison of different color shades of the same color group to make the right color decision easier.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/11/p-18-369.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/11/p-18-365" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/11/p-18-365.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF received SEPAWA Innovation Award 2018 for Tinosorb® S Lite Aqua||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/11/p-18-365.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/Bild%202_Tinosorb%20S%20Lite%20Aqua_Winners:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="lazyload rendition" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">November 5, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF received SEPAWA Innovation Award 2018 for Tinosorb® S Lite Aqua</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Berlin, Germany, November 5, 2018 – During this year’s SEPAWA Congress in Berlin, BASF Care Creations™ was recognized with the “Innovation Award 2018” for its UV filter solution Tinosorb® S Lite Aqua. The jury awarded the BASF product with the first place because of its special properties that enable the creation of high SPF sunscreens with a light skin feel.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/11/p-18-365.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-358" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-358.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF and SINOPEC sign Memorandum of Understanding to expand cooperation in China  ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-358.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">October 29, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF and SINOPEC sign Memorandum of Understanding to expand cooperation in China  </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, Germany and Nanjing, China – October 29, 2018 – BASF and SINOPEC have signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) in Beijing to further strengthen their partnership in upstream and downstream chemical production in China. The partners intend to build an additional steam cracker and to further expand their existing 50:50 joint venture, BASF-YPC Company, Limited (BASF-YPC). A joint pre-feasbility study will be concluded by the end of 2018. Additionally, the two companies will jointly explore new business opportunities in China’s fast-growing battery materials market.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-358.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-343" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-343.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Third quarter 2018: BASF Group increases sales – earnings below prior-year quarter||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-343.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/Fahnen_A16_0008_20171:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">October 26, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Third quarter 2018: BASF Group increases sales – earnings below prior-year quarter</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">In the third quarter of 2018, BASF Group sales rose by 8% year on year to reach €15.6 billion. This was primarily attributable to higher sales prices in all segments. Volumes growth and the acquisition of the Bayer businesses in August 2018 also contributed to the sales increase. Negative currency effects had an offsetting impact. Income from operations (EBIT) before special items declined by €232 million to €1.5 billion, mainly due to the significantly lower contribution from the Chemicals segment. EBIT before special items also decreased considerably in the Functional Materials &amp; Solutions and Agricultural Solutions segments, but fell only slightly in the Performance Products segment. This was partially offset by improved earnings in Other.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" Durasorb provides gas processing plant operators, especially liquefied natural gas (LNG) plants, with more reliable and more robust dehydration service. The new product family combines innovative materials developed from BASF’s unique Sorbead® technology and proprietary design software to calculate the performance of the adsorbents in all parts of the dehydration vessel and maximize the overall performance and life of the bed.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-341.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-340" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-340.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Regulatory approval process for the intended acquisition of Solvay’s polyamide business moves forward||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-340.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">October 16, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Regulatory approval process for the intended acquisition of Solvay’s polyamide business moves forward</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">In September 2017, BASF and Solvay agreed that BASF would acquire Solvay’s polyamide business subject to approval of the relevant merger control authorities. The approval process of the EU Commission is ongoing. To meet the concerns of the EU Commission, BASF has offered to refrain from acquiring certain parts of Solvay’s European polyamide business including innovation capabilities and manufacturing assets of Solvay’s intermediate and engineering plastics business. The EU Commission is now examining this offer and submitting it for market testing before completing its review procedure.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-340.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-338" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-338.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||ExxonMobil and BASF Corporation demonstrate new solvent to decrease sulfur emissions||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-338.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">October 15, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">ExxonMobil and BASF Corporation demonstrate new solvent to decrease sulfur emissions</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">HOUSTON, TX – ExxonMobil Catalysts and Licensing LLC and BASF Corporation are conducting a full scale commercial demonstration of a new gas treating solvent at Imperial Oil’s Sarnia Refinery. The companies jointly developed the new amine-based solvent aimed at meeting stringent sulfur emissions standards with greater efficiency, further raising the bar for tail gas treating and acid gas removal processes.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-338.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-331" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-331.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Workaround, ALBIS PLASTIC and BASF optimize smart glove for industrial applications||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-331.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P331_Handschuh_Ult_Vision:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">October 12, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Workaround, ALBIS PLASTIC and BASF optimize smart glove for industrial applications</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">In close cooperation, Workaround GmbH, ALBIS PLASTIC GmbH and BASF have modified an important component of the smart glove ProGlove. After deep analysis, Ultramid Vision is now being used on the integrated scanning unit, allowing even simpler, quicker and safer work processes. The ProGlove is already in everyday use by leading branded manufacturers in the automotive, logistics and chemical sectors. The optimized version is now being presented to a wide specialist audience at Fakuma 2018 in Friedrichshafen, Germany.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-331.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-330" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-330.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||For even more metal replacement: one T for 1000 tasks||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-330.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P330_Ultramid_Advanced_T1000-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">October 11, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">For even more metal replacement: one T for 1000 tasks</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">After the market launch of Ultramid® Advanced N, BASF is now introducing another polyphthalamide (PPA) at the Fakuma trade fair in Germany: Ultramid® Advanced T1000 – a new group of compounds based on polyamide 6T/6I. Within the Ultramid® family, Ultramid® Advanced T1000 is the product group with the highest strength and stiffness and with stable mechanical properties at temperatures of up to 120°C (dry) and up to 80°C (conditioned). Due to its partially aromatic chemical structure, it offers high resistance to humidity and to aggressive media – outperforming conventional polyamides and many other PPA materials on the market.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-330.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-335" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-335.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||SEPAWA 2018: BASF showcases solutions to meet market trends||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-335.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P335_Bild%201_Baby%20Care:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">October 10, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">SEPAWA 2018: BASF showcases solutions to meet market trends</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">At the SEPAWA Congress in Berlin from October 10 to 12, BASF will be presenting the company’s latest solutions for applications in the home care and industrial &amp; institutional (I&amp;I) cleaning and personal care markets. BASF shares booths 175-179 and 191-194 with its European sales company, BTC Europe.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-335.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-329" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-329.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||The current infographic||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-329.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">October 9, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">The current infographic</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Today at an event in London, BASF presents HertzstückTM, a groundbreaking infrared detector which may soon transform smartphones into portable laboratories that fit in a pocket. The shown prototype of a miniature spectrometer will, for example, enable consumers to measure the fat content of curd cheese, as the infographic shows. This innovative near infrared (NIR) sensor for wavelengths of 1 3 µm was developed by the startup trinamiX, a company founded by BASF researchers in Ludwigshafen in 2015. The patented thin film encapsulation of the functional semiconductor layer is very stable and protects the sensor from environmental influences such as water and oxygen. This miniaturization means that HertzstückTM can soon be installed as a sensor chip on the circuit board of a smartphone.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-329.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-333" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-333.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF donates €100,000 for Indonesia relief efforts||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-333.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">October 8, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF donates €100,000 for Indonesia relief efforts</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, Germany – October 8, 2018 – BASF SE has decided to contribute €100,000 to relief efforts in Sulawesi in Indonesia. With funding from BASF, BASF Stiftung, a charitable foundation based in Germany, will support international disaster relief activities as immediate aid to victims of the September 28 earthquake and tsunami.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-333.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-334" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-334.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Master Builders Solutions® launches innovative shrinkage-reducing admixture MasterLife SRA 900||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/10/p-18-334.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">October 5, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Master Builders Solutions® launches innovative shrinkage-reducing admixture MasterLife SRA 900</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">With MasterLife SRA 900, Master Builders Solutions® is introducing an innovative admixture to extend the service life of concrete. class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Singapore – September 27, 2018 - Modern day tennis players tend to play with more spin and as a result, hit the ball out of the top of the racket rather than the center. The disadvantage of this is players swing with more force to generate more power and spin. This puts extra load on the player’s arm and can result in injury.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/09/p-18-322.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/09/p-18-325" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/09/p-18-325.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF and LetterOne sign agreement to merge Wintershall and DEA||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/09/p-18-325.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">September 27, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF and LetterOne sign agreement to merge Wintershall and DEA</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, Germany – September 27, 2018 – BASF and LetterOne signed a definitive transaction agreement to merge their respective oil and gas businesses in a joint venture, which will operate under the name Wintershall DEA. “With Wintershall DEA we create the leading independent European exploration and production company with international operations in core regions. By combining the two German-based entities, BASF and LetterOne lay the basis for further profitable growth,” said Dr. Hans-Ulrich Engel, Vice Chairman of the Board of Executive Directors and Chief Financial Officer of BASF SE. In the medium term, BASF and LetterOne envisage to list Wintershall DEA through an Initial Public Offering (IPO).</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/09/p-18-325.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/09/p-18-312" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/09/p-18-312.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF has developed the world's first particle foam based on polyethersulfone||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/09/p-18-312.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">September 19, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF has developed the world's first particle foam based on polyethersulfone</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">After two years of intensive research, BASF is now able to present prototypes of the world's first particle foam based on polyethersulfone (PESU). The foam is characterized by its unique combination of properties: high-temperature resistance, inherent flame retardancy - and its extreme light weight coupled with great stiffness and strength. It is therefore particularly well suited for complex-shaped components in cars, airplanes and trains, which require excellent mechanical properties together with the ability to withstand high operating temperatures or to meet stringent flame-retardant requirements.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/09/p-18-312.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/09/p-18-318" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/09/p-18-318.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF introduces latest scientific findings at IFSCC Congress 2018||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/09/p-18-318.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">September 18, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF introduces latest scientific findings at IFSCC Congress 2018</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Munich, Germany – September 18th, 2018 – BASF experts from different fields will share their latest scientific findings at this year’s International Federation of Societies of Cosmetic Chemists (IFSCC) Congress, from September 18 to 21 in Munich. class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">September 14, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF opens modular lab for automotive OEM coatings at its Münster site</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF’s Coatings division has opened a new laboratory for automotive OEM coatings at its site in Münster, Germany. The modular “Lean Lab” concept aims to ensure optimized, digitalized and transparent processes and efficient use of resources in the laboratory area throughout Europe. Discrete working processes of the lab employees and the use of standardized and automated processes allow BASF to meet future market requirements quickly and flexibly. In line with this, the workforce in Münster is supported by a lab dosing machine that was specially developed for BASF and is the only one of its kind in the coatings industry.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/09/p-18-315.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/09/p-18-310" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/09/p-18-310.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Master Builders Solutions® presents 3D-printed formworks||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/09/p-18-310.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">September 10, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Master Builders Solutions® presents 3D-printed formworks</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">At the first International Conference on Concrete and Digital Fabrication, which is being held in Zürich, Switzerland, from September 9 to 13, 2018, BASF is pre-senting its versatile portfolio of innovative solutions under the brand name of Master Builders Solutions®. Participants will be also able to witness a demonstration of 3D-printed formworks and concrete casted parts, presented by BASF application technicians.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/09/p-18-310.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/09/p-18-309" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/09/p-18-309.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF invests in alkoxylate capacity expansion at the company's Antwerp site||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/09/p-18-309.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">September 6, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF invests in alkoxylate capacity expansion at the company's Antwerp site</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Antwerp, Belgium – September 06, 2018 – BASF has started a stepwise capacity increase of its production plant for alkoxylation – a downstream technology of ethylene oxide production – in Antwerp, Belgium. The first additional capacities will be available from as early as the 3rd quarter of 2018.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/09/p-18-309.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/09/p-18-297" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/09/p-18-297.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF launches adsorbent Sorbead® Air to meet needs of compressed air market ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/09/p-18-297.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">September 5, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF launches adsorbent Sorbead® Air to meet needs of compressed air market </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF launched Sorbead® Air, its most economical and efficient adsorbent for air drying, specifically tailored for the compressed air market. Grolman expands the marketing of the BASF specialty chemicals under the Baxxodur® brand to Italy, Spain and Portugal, specifically for use in epoxy resin based applications. This is BASF’s first catalyst based on a new Improved Zeolite Y (IZY) technology.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/08/p-18-282.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/08/p-18-283" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/08/p-18-283.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF launches next generation of carotenoid formulations||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/08/p-18-283.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">August 21, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF launches next generation of carotenoid formulations</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, Germany – August 21, 2018 – BASF Animal Nutrition launches its Lucantin® NXT product line in the EU 28 market. The transaction adds a well-recognized brand with a very successful business track record to BASF’s portfolio. The acquired vegetable seeds business comprises 24 crops and about 2,600 varieties. It also includes well-established, strong R&amp;D and breeding systems with over 100 unique breeding programs in more than 15 crops.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/08/p-18-288.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/08/p-IR-180816" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/08/p-IR-180816.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF PETRONAS Chemicals plans to expand production capacity for acrylic acid and  butyl acrylate in Kuantan, Malaysia||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/08/p-IR-180816.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">August 16, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF PETRONAS Chemicals plans to expand production capacity for acrylic acid and  butyl acrylate in Kuantan, Malaysia</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Kuantan, Malaysia – August 16, 2018 – BASF PETRONAS Chemicals plans to expand its production capacity of the acrylic acid plant and butyl acrylate plants at its Verbund site in Kuantan, Malaysia. for production and logistics at the Ludwigshafen site</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Due to the persistent high temperatures and low water levels in the Rhine, BASF SE has to adjust production and logistics at its Ludwigshafen site.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" The site – which is planned to be completed by 2021 – will house production, warehousing, a state-of-the-art laboratory and administrative offices in an ideal environment for manufacturing development. This investment will strengthen Chemetall’s position in China to deliver the high level of service and quality solutions customers have come to expect from Chemetall. The site is ideally located at the Dushan Port Economic Development Zone of Pinghu, which provides excellent infrastructure to this project.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/08/p-18-284.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/08/p-18-285" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/08/p-18-285.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF closes acquisition of businesses and assets from Bayer||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/08/p-18-285.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">August 1, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF closes acquisition of businesses and assets from Bayer</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF has closed the acquisition of a range of businesses and assets from Bayer. BASF will extend its production capacities for isoindoline yellow pigments by around 70% by 2020, as the demand for high-performance pigments grows. Bright yellow tones that offer a high degree of weather resistance and temperature stability are sought after, particularly in demanding applications involving industrial coatings.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-280.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-276" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-276.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF welcomes EU approval of nano-sized UV filter in cosmetics||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-276.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 30, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF welcomes EU approval of nano-sized UV filter in cosmetics</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Duesseldorf, Germany – July 30, 2018 – BASF welcomes the official entry of Methylene Bis-Benzotriazolyl Tetramethylbutylphenol (MBBT) as a nano-sized UV filter into Annex VI of the EU Cosmetic Regulation. MBBT is an ingredient of the BASF product Tinosorb® M. “We are the largest supplier of safe-to-use, high-performance UV filters that help to protect the skin against the harmful effects of UV radiation such as sunburn, premature appearance of wrinkles and – with frequent intensive exposure – an increased risk of skin cancer. Tinosorb M is an integral part of our broad sun care portfolio and has proven its relevance for many years by being used in numerous consumer products worldwide. We welcome the EU approval of MBBT in nano form after this long transitional period,” said Dirk Mampe, Vice President, Business Management Personal Care Solutions Europe.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-276.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-277" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-277.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF increases prices for impregnating resins in Europe||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-277.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 30, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF increases prices for impregnating resins in Europe</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">With immediate effect BASF increases prices for all its Kauramin® and Kaurit® impregnating resins by €30 per metric ton in Europe on top of fluctuations in raw material prices as of the month of August. This was driven by higher prices in all segments, particularly in Functional Materials &amp; Solutions and Oil &amp; Gas. In addition, with the exception of Performance Products, all segments achieved volumes growth. Fourte is based on BASF’s new multiple framework topology (MFT) technology offering, and has been optimized to deliver superior selectivity to butylenes while maintaining catalyst activity, which helps refineries maximize their profits.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-250.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-273" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-273.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF pursues a capacity expansion of the integrated ethylene oxide complex at its Verbund site in Antwerp||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-273.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 23, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF pursues a capacity expansion of the integrated ethylene oxide complex at its Verbund site in Antwerp</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF pursues a significant capacity expansion of the integrated ethylene oxide complex at its Verbund site in Antwerp, Belgium. The results will be presented in a conference call that will be transmitted via the internet from 09:00 a.m.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-263.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-261" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-261.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Optimizing materials and software for 3D printing||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-261.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 19, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Optimizing materials and software for 3D printing</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen/Germany, Leuven/Belgium – July 19, 2018 – BASF is expanding its cooperation with Materialise, a leading supplier of 3D printing technologies. At the same time, BASF has agreed to invest US$25 million in the Belgian company, which is headquartered in Leuven. The two partners are working together within the framework of an open business model to continuously improve materials and software for various 3D printing technologies and bring them more rapidly to the market. The companies are focusing on applications in the consumer goods sector and in the automotive and aviation industries. The agreement allows for systematic, wider scale testing and further optimization by BASF of its materials on the machines and within the infrastructure of Materialise.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-261.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-259" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-259.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF advances capabilities in infant nutrition with launch of  2’-fucosyllactose||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-259.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 16, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF advances capabilities in infant nutrition with launch of  2’-fucosyllactose</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, Germany – July 16, 2018 – Newtrition®, BASF’s human nutrition brand, will launch 2’-fucosyllactose (2’-FL), a human milk oligosaccharide (HMO) for the infant nutrition market by early 2019. HMOs are a unique group of carbohydrates naturally found in human breast milk with 2’-FL being the most abundant.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-259.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-260" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-260.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF’s coatings solutions help NIO shape new generation of smart electric cars in China ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-260.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 16, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF’s coatings solutions help NIO shape new generation of smart electric cars in China </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">With its coatings solutions, BASF has helped to create an unforgettable look and unparalleled performance for the ES8 – the high performance electric Sport Utility Vehicle (SUV) from NIO, a multinational electric vehicle company headquartered in China. The seven-seater electric SUV uses BASF’s coatings solutions for the surface pre-treatment and all coatings layers. The ES8 includes BASF’s waterborne coatings technologies, as well as Oxsilan® from BASF’s Chemetall brand, an advanced thin-film technology for metal protection and waterborne coatings.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-260.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-258" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-258.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Technology for future mobility: Red Dot awards BASF’s temperature management system for automotive coatings||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-258.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 12, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Technology for future mobility: Red Dot awards BASF’s temperature management system for automotive coatings</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF’s Coatings division was awarded the Red Dot in the “materials and surfaces” category for its functional coating technology for passive temperature management. With production in Kaisten coming online in 2019 and in Singapore in early 2021, BASF aims to better serve the increasing demand from customers in Asia and Europe, Middle East and Africa from its regional supply points. In addition, BASF is investing in its McIntosh, Alabama facility in the US to improve asset reliability and further expand capacity to meet growing customer demand.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-256.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-254" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-254.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF expands portfolio of hydrolysis-resistant polyesters||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-254.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 9, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF expands portfolio of hydrolysis-resistant polyesters</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">The demand of the automotive industry for highly effective sensors is increasing. class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Lyon, France/Delta, British Columbia, Canada — July 5, 2018 — BASF and Mazza Innovation today announced the signing of an exclusive, long-term Advanc3D Materials offers advanced, tailor-made plastic powders and formulations for selective laser sintering (SLS) together with process knowhow. Setup Performance, which operates a production site in Lyon, is Advanc3D Materials’ most important partner in the development and manufacture of SLS materials. BNB is integrating both companies into its subsidiary BASF 3D Printing Solutions GmbH (B3DPS). The acquisition is an important step forward for BASF in its expansion in the field of 3D printing.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-247.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-246" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-246.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Gold and Silver Awards for Sustainability Campaign from  Master Builders Solutions®||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/07/p-18-246.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 3, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Gold and Silver Awards for Sustainability Campaign from  Master Builders Solutions®</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">“Quantified Sustainabile Benefits” – the sustainability campaign from Master Builders Solutions® convinced the juries of both the Deutscher Preis für Onlinekommunikation (German Award for Online Communications) and the Best of Content Marketing Award (BCM), Europe’s biggest content marketing competition. data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, Germany – June 28, 2018 – Driven by continued increases in cost of raw materials, transportation, and energy, as well as restricted availability of selected raw class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 25, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF submits regulatory dossiers for two  new herbicide active ingredients</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF has started the global registration initiatives for two new herbicide active ingredients. The company submitted the regulatory dossier for Luximo™ herbicide in the European Union (EU) and in Australia and for Tirexor™ herbicide in Australia as well. These steps are important milestones in expanding BASF’s global herbicide portfolio. The two compounds have demonstrated excellent performance against a broad range of difficult-to-control grasses and broadleaf weeds and are expected to help growers worldwide successfully safeguard their crops while managing the ongoing challenge of herbicide resistance.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/06/p-18-242.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/06/p-18-243" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/06/p-18-243.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF increases prices for bismuth vanadate pigments worldwide||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/06/p-18-243.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 25, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF increases prices for bismuth vanadate pigments worldwide</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">LUDWIGSHAFEN, Germany, June 25, 2018 – Effective today, or as contracts allow, BASF will increase prices for bismuth vanadate pigments and preparations based on this chemistry by up to 15% percent worldwide. The price increase will affect several market segments, predominantly the coatings industry. Price adjustments are necessary due to significantly higher raw material prices.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/06/p-18-243.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/06/p-18-240" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/06/p-18-240.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Sumitomo Chemical and BASF take major step in global development of a novel fungicide||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/06/p-18-240.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 22, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Sumitomo Chemical and BASF take major step in global development of a novel fungicide</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Tokyo, Japan, and Ludwigshafen, Germany – June 22, 2018 – Sumitomo Chemical and BASF, two of the world’s leading chemical companies, announced today that under an existing joint development framework, Sumitomo Chemical has submitted a registration application in the EU for the novel fungicide compound with the ISO common name metyltetraprole . The new facility, located in the existing BASF production site, includes a state of the art compounding extruder, stretch film and tape lines as well as an injection molding unit capable of simulating the polymer production and processing technology. The facility can combine intelligent process automation and expertise that will increase the quality of plastics produced.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/06/p-18-227.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/06/p-18-219" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/06/p-18-219.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Ucrete industrial flooring achieved Halal certification||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/06/p-18-219.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 7, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ucrete industrial flooring achieved Halal certification</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ucrete industrial flooring from the Master Builders Solutions® product range have been certified for use in Halal production facilities. The certification process, carried by Halal Certification Europe, involved a detailed investigation of the raw materials and suppliers used in the manufacture of Ucrete and also the auditing of our production facility in Redditch, UK. “This approval certifies that Ucrete industrial flooring fully conform to Halal requirements and demonstrates our commitment to meeting all our customers’ requirements” says Ian Smith, Global Business Segment Manager Flooring at BASF.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/06/p-18-219.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/06/p-18-223" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/06/p-18-223.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF at ACHEMA 2018||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/06/p-18-223.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 7, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF at ACHEMA 2018</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF’s Engineering &amp; Maintenance will again be in Frankfurt for the ACHEMA, the World Forum and leading show for the process industries, held this year from June 11 to 15. The demand for effect pigments, which BASF manufactures and sells under its global brand Colors &amp; Effects®, is increasing. By 2020, the company will extend its production capacity for Paliocrom® effect pigments by more than 30%. With this investment of about €15 million to the Ludwigshafen and Besigheim sites in Germany, the company underlines its position as one of the leading suppliers of aluminum-based effect pigments which allow customers to create new, trendy coatings with high-quality effects.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/06/p-18-222.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/05/p-IR-180530" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/05/p-IR-180530.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF inaugurates electronic-grade sulfuric acid plant in China||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/05/p-IR-180530.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 30, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF inaugurates electronic-grade sulfuric acid plant in China</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Shanghai, China – May 30, 2018 – BASF today started operations at a new electronic-grade sulfuric acid (H2SO4) plant in Jiaxing, China, to serve the country’s growing semiconductor manufacturing industry. Driven by strong demand from customers, the plant has simultaneously started its expansion phase to double the production capacity before the completion of the facility. As a single-layer, flexible mat, it is now available for a variety of applications in the construction and modernization sectors. The novel high-performance insulation, an inorganic aerogel, has been developed in many years of cooperation with Aspen Aerogels Inc. in the USA. Since 2016, there has also been an intensification of cooperation with BASF in the field of aerogel-based insulation materials. At a joint booth, the two companies are now exhibiting the new product for the first time at Insulation Expo Europe (IEX) in Cologne on May 16 and 17.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/05/p-18-205.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/05/p-18-200" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/05/p-18-200.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||MasterFinish CLN 689: an innovative and eco-friendly formwork cleaner by Master Builders Solutions®||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/05/p-18-200.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 9, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">MasterFinish CLN 689: an innovative and eco-friendly formwork cleaner by Master Builders Solutions®</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Mannheim, Germany, May 09, 2018 – The high-performance MasterFinish CLN 689 formwork cleaner is an innovative cleaning agent for spotless concrete surfaces developed by the experts from Master Builders Solutions®.
