The award is presented to suppliers who distinguish themselves by meeting performance metrics for quality, execution, innovation, and total enterprise cost.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/05/p-18-204.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/05/p-18-185" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/05/p-18-185.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF Group posts earnings growth in first quarter;  outlook for 2018 confirmed||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/05/p-18-185.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/A16_0008_2017:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 4, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF Group posts earnings growth in first quarter;  outlook for 2018 confirmed</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">“We were pleased with the development in the first quarter of 2018, we have had a good start to the year,” said Dr. Kurt Bock, Chairman of the Board of Executive Directors of BASF SE, commenting on the year-on-year rise in first-quarter earnings during the BASF Annual Shareholders’ Meeting at Congress Center Rosengarten in Mannheim, Germany. At €2.5 billion, income from operations (EBIT) before special items in the first quarter of 2018 was €55 million higher than in the same period of the previous year. This was mainly due to the significant improvement in earnings in the Chemicals and Oil &amp; Gas segments. Sales declined slightly by €211 million compared with the first quarter of 2017 to €16.6 billion. This was attributable to significantly negative currency effects ( 8%) in all segments. Higher sales prices (+5%), especially in the Functional Materials &amp; Solutions and Chemicals segments, and increased volumes (+2%) had a positive impact on sales. All segments except Performance Products recorded volumes growth.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/05/p-18-185.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/05/p-18-197" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/05/p-18-197.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Change of CEO at BASF: Brudermüller to succeed Bock||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/05/p-18-197.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 4, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Change of CEO at BASF: Brudermüller to succeed Bock</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Effective as of the end of the Annual Shareholders’ Meeting 2018, Dr. Martin Brudermüller will become the new Chairman of the Board of Executive Directors of BASF SE.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/05/p-18-197.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/05/p-18-199" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/05/p-18-199.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Changes on the Supervisory Board of BASF SE ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/05/p-18-199.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 4, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Changes on the Supervisory Board of BASF SE </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Effective today, Tatjana Diether joined the Supervisory Board of BASF SE as an employee representative. As an elected substitute member, she succeeds Ralf Bastian, who retired from the Supervisory Board following the Annual Shareholders’ Meeting on May 4, 2018.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/05/p-18-199.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/05/p-18-195" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/05/p-18-195.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF and Solenis to join forces by combining paper and water chemicals businesses||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/05/p-18-195.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 3, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF and Solenis to join forces by combining paper and water chemicals businesses</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, Germany – May 3, 2018 – On May 2, 2018, BASF and Solenis have signed an agreement to join forces by combining BASF’s paper wet-end and water chemicals business with Solenis. The combined entity with pro-forma sales of around €2.4 billion and around 5,000 employees in 2017 aims to deliver additional value for paper and water treatment customers. The goal is to create a customer-focused global solutions provider for the industry. For the paper industry, the product portfolio of the combined enterprise will cover the entire range of functional and process wet-end chemicals, solutions for the water cycle for paper mills, as well as comprehensive service capabilities. For the water treatment industry, the customers of the joint organization will benefit from Solenis’ high-quality service capabilities and BASF’s broad water treatment chemicals platform. Pending approval by the relevant authorities, closing is anticipated for the end of 2018 at the earliest. Financial terms of the transaction are not being disclosed.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/05/p-18-195.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/05/p-18-186" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/05/p-18-186.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||An Old Bunker Equipped for the Future||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/05/p-18-186.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 2, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">An Old Bunker Equipped for the Future</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Combining tried-and-tested competencies to create something new—this will soon become reality in the Creation Center with the first location in Ludwigshafen, Germany. This includes Düsseldorf-Holthausen, the largest site worldwide for the production of ingredients for the BASF personal care business, which was recertified at the end of last year. The certification confirms that the sites meet the strict requirements of e.g. product quality and hygiene standards during manufacturing processes. In addition, BASF has qualified significant parts of its supply chain for the personal care business according to the EFfCI GMP standard. In a second step, set to be concluded in 2021, BASF plans additional audits to further increase quality and transparency along the value chain.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-190.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-183" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-183.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Increase of BASF production capacities for aliphatic polyisocyanates||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-183.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">April 25, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Increase of BASF production capacities for aliphatic polyisocyanates</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF has expanded its capacities for the production of Basonat® hardeners at the Ludwigshafen site. BASF’s initiative “Idea Management” proves this time and again, with employees submitting suggestions that make everyday work safer, easier and more efficient. By implementing improvements initiated by employees, BASF was able to save around €58 million globally last year. For example, pressure and temperature were specifically adapted in a chemical production process. The result is an economic benefit in the seven-digit range. These and more than 23,000 other suggestions were implemented in 2017, maintaining the high level of the previous year. BASF rewarded the ingenuity of its employees with bonuses totaling €4.3 million.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-171.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-178" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-178.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Personnel changes at BASF||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-178.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">April 19, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Personnel changes at BASF</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, Germany – The Board of Executive Directors of BASF has announced the following personnel changes:</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-178.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-177" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-177.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF drives sustainable palm with major portfolio switch||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-177.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">April 18, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF drives sustainable palm with major portfolio switch</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Amsterdam, Netherlands – April 18, 2018 – BASF shifts its Personal Care portfolio and will offer palm-based specialties for the cosmetics industry exclusively as certified sustainable. The move was announced at its 3rd Palm Dialog event during the in-cosmetics global exhibition. “This is an important milestone for the cosmetics industry’s progress towards sustainable palm – and some of our customers have already made the step,” said Xavier Susterac, Senior Vice President BASF Personal Care Europe.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-177.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-SD-zerox40" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-SD-zerox40.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Agriculture industry unites to deliver a pipeline of innovative vector control tools to help eradicate malaria by 2040||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-SD-zerox40.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">April 18, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Agriculture industry unites to deliver a pipeline of innovative vector control tools to help eradicate malaria by 2040</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">London: 18 April 2018 - Today, at the London Commonwealth Heads of Government Meeting, the world’s leading Crop Protection companies announce their commitment to support the research, development and supply of innovative products to save lives and help eradicate malaria by 2040.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-SD-zerox40.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-165" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-165.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Helping customers assess their portfolio with BASF's Sustainable Solution Steering methodology||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-165.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">April 17, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Helping customers assess their portfolio with BASF's Sustainable Solution Steering methodology</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Sustainability is an integral part of BASF’s corporate strategy. A tangible example of how BASF carries out its company purpose “We create chemistry for a sustainable future” is the Sustainable Solution Steering method. This method has been developed by BASF to assess and steer its product portfolio based on defined sustainability criteria. It considers the entire value chain and markets including industry- and region-specific views. The approach reflects economic, ecological and social aspects of the products and solutions in their respective application. The company is now publishing the detailed method to enable customers and other interested parties to steer their portfolio according to their sustainability targets.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-165.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-169" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-169.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||in-cosmetics 2018: BASF introduces new solutions for healthy skin and hair based on the “Personal Care Elements”||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-169.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">April 17, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">in-cosmetics 2018: BASF introduces new solutions for healthy skin and hair based on the “Personal Care Elements”</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Amsterdam, Netherlands – April 17, 2018 – At this year’s in-cosmetics in Amsterdam, from April 17 to 19, BASF focuses on the main purposes of personal care products which are taken up in BASF’s four “Personal Care Elements”: protect, cleanse, beautify and maintain. Based on these elements, BASF unveils attractive new solutions for healthy skin and hair serving the latest trends in the personal care market.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-169.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-170" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-170.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF’s new personal care ingredients protect and beautify skin and hair||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-170.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">April 17, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF’s new personal care ingredients protect and beautify skin and hair</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Amsterdam, Netherlands – April 17, 2018 – As external influences and stresses have a huge impact on skin and hair, today’s health-conscious consumers are looking for personal care solutions that provide protection together with a flawless appearance. At this year’s in-cosmetics (booth E40), BASF presents new ingredients for skin and hair care products that have been proven to help protect and rebalance the skin and to slow down the hair aging process. They enable manufacturers of personal care products to respond to current market trends and meet the consumers’ demand for products supporting their lifestyle.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-170.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-174" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-174.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF and arc-net collaborate to use blockchain technology for livestock sustainability||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-174.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">April 17, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF and arc-net collaborate to use blockchain technology for livestock sustainability</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">FLORHAM PARK, NEW JERSEY, and BELFAST, NORTHERN IRELAND, April 17, 2018 – BASF Corporation and arc-net, are collaborating to use blockchain technology to capture and analyze sustainability parameters in livestock production along the value chain. arc-net is a technology company utilizing blockchain technology to provide transparency in the agri-food industry. As part of this collaboration, BASF will use its tailored calculation tool, AgBalance™ Livestock to provide science-based information on environmental impacts along the animal production value chain.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-174.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-168" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-168.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Force Majeure for ecoflex® and ecovio® lifted||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-168.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">April 12, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Force Majeure for ecoflex® and ecovio® lifted</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">On April 3, 2018, BASF was able to remove the remaining amounts of contamination from the ecoflex plant. The contamination has led to a longer plant shut down and declaration of Force Majeure for the products ecoflex® and ecovio® last fall. BASF now lifts the Force Majeure for these two products with immediate effect. As inventory levels are still very low, incoming orders cannot be fulfilled at the requested time in every case.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-168.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/P-US-18-044" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/P-US-18-044.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Yara and BASF open world-scale ammonia plant in Freeport, Texas||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/P-US-18-044.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">April 11, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Yara and BASF open world-scale ammonia plant in Freeport, Texas</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">OSLO, NORWAY and FLORHAM PARK, NJ, April 11, 2018 – Yara International ASA and BASF today celebrated the opening of a new world-scale ammonia plant in Freeport, Texas, USA. The ISO 16128 standard of the International Organization for Standardization (ISO) comprises guidelines on definitions for natural and organic cosmetic ingredients and offers a framework to determine the natural content of ingredients as well as formulations. It is an addition to existing standards, e.g. COSMOS (COSMetic Organic Standard) or NATRUE. A harmonized definition for natural and organic cosmetic ingredients increases transparency for manufacturers and consumers alike.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-162.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-164" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-164.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF presents new fire-resistant tail sealant for underground construction at World Tunnel Congress in Dubai||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/04/p-18-164.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">April 5, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF presents new fire-resistant tail sealant for underground construction at World Tunnel Congress in Dubai</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Dubai, United Arab Emirates, April 5, 2018 – The fire-resistant grease MasterRoc TSG 800 is the latest innovation of the Master Builders Solutions product range from BASF for tunnel boring machines. The price increase affects bulk amounts in tank trucks and containers.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-160.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-152" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-152.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Packaging With High-Speed||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-152.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">March 27, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Packaging With High-Speed</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF now offers a new plastic grade for the manufacture of EPS foam packaging. data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-151.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF brings daylight into dark spaces||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-151.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">March 15, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF brings daylight into dark spaces</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">How can natural daylight be brought into building interiors so even windowless rooms do not need artificial light during the day? And how can sunlight be used optimally behind glass facades without creating glare? BASF has found a smart solution to these two problems. The system is based on the principle of light guidance and comprises three components: a film, a light shaft and light fixtures. The film is embedded in insulated glass and optimally guides the light from there into a light shaft containing reflective film. The shaft brings sunlight deep into the interior of a building, where light fixtures shine the daylight into the rooms. These light fixtures are also equipped with LED lamps that provide light in the rooms when natural daylight is unavailable or insufficient. Together with Bartenbach GmbH, BASF will be presenting this innovative daylight management system with a 1:10 scale model on display at the Light + Building trade fair in Frankfurt, Germany, from March 18-23, 2018 (stand A92 in hall 3.0)</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-151.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-140" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-140.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Under the virtual magnifying glass||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-140.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">March 13, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Under the virtual magnifying glass</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF has expanded its simulation tool Ultrasim® so that it can now precisely predict the foaming and curing of the flexible integral foam system Elastofoam® I for car steering wheels. Thus the most important chemical reactions as well as the flow behavior in the mold can be calculated. The new service allows steering wheel manufacturers to reduce development cycles, lowering costs, while realizing the trends towards greater functional integration, more electronics and individual design in steering wheels.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-140.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-148" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-148.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Award-winning coating technology from BASF improves energy efficiency of vehicles||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-148.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">March 13, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Award-winning coating technology from BASF improves energy efficiency of vehicles</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF’s Coatings division has won the internationally coveted iF Design Award in the category “Automobiles/Vehicles” for its functional paint technology for passive temperature management. The jury of the iF Design Award honored the specific properties of the paint system and its design potential for mobility of the future – a successful combination of functionality and design. The prize was presented during the iF Design Award Night at “BMW Welt” in Munich.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-148.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-139" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-139.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Simulating precision – avoiding errors||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-139.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">March 12, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Simulating precision – avoiding errors</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF now offers a new module for simulating applications of injection-molded components. BASF’s Ultrasim® simulation tool has long been able to deliver precise calculations of the anisotropic mechanical behavior of fiber-filled plastics after manufacturing in the injection-molding process. But another service has now been added: a thermomechanical model for fiber-reinforced thermoplastics now enables precise forecasts of temperature-dependent deformation via simulations.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-139.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-143" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-143.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||New FCC butylene additive Evolve™ addresses refineries demands||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-143.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">March 12, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">New FCC butylene additive Evolve™ addresses refineries demands</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF announced today the launch of Evolve™, a proprietary new Fluid Catalytic Cracking (FCC) additive designed for butylene selectivity. Evolve provides measurable improvements in butylene yields while preserving unit conversion and valuable fuels yields when compared to existing technologies. Refiners worldwide are facing the effects of tightening fuel regulations as stricter sulfur fuels standards continue to be implemented globally.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-143.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-132" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-132.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF closes agreement to form BASF Toda America LLC (BTA) for battery materials||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-132.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">March 8, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF closes agreement to form BASF Toda America LLC (BTA) for battery materials</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, March 8, 2018 – BASF, the world’s largest chemical supplier to the automotive industry, has closed its agreement to form BASF Toda America LLC (BTA). As the next step in BASF’s business growth strategy for its battery materials business, the new entity will be majority owned and controlled by BASF and is the second successful collaboration of BASF and TODA. BTA will produce and market high energy Nickel Cobalt Manganese (NCM) and Nickel Cobalt Aluminum Oxide (NCA) cathode active materials (CAM) for e-mobility applications.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-132.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-137" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-137.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF in exclusive talks with Bayer to acquire vegetable seeds business||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-137.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">March 7, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF in exclusive talks with Bayer to acquire vegetable seeds business</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF is in exclusive talks to acquire Bayer’s entire vegetable seeds business, operating under the global trademark Nunhems®. Bayer intends to divest this business in the context of its planned acquisition of Monsanto. Definitive agreements have not been concluded. With this transaction, BASF targets to enhance its future seed platform and the market position of its Agricultural Solutions business.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-137.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-135" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-135.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Deicer for private use now available online||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-135.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">March 1, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Deicer for private use now available online</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, March 1, 2018 – The Addcon Group and BASF have teamed up to develop a solution for the online distribution of a deicer for private use on Amazon. Addcon markets the proven deicer based on sodium formate, a salt produced from BASF formic acid, under the Viaform® brand. This is a tried-and-tested solution for deicing sidewalks, house entrances, streets, cycle lanes, company premises and artificial sports pitches. Viaform is based on Addcon’s professional deicing solution, which has been used on runways and aprons at airports for more than 20 years.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/03/p-18-135.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/02/p-18-123" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/02/p-18-123.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Good start for BASF in 2018||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/02/p-18-123.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/A16_0008_2017:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Business &amp; Financial News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">February 27, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Good start for BASF in 2018</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Following a successful 2017 business year, BASF has had a good start to the year 2018. “Last year, we achieved significant growth and were able to further increase our profitability. Product candidates from all indications have reached advanced development phases. Global registration is proceeding for key technologies such as Revysol® fungicide and Inscalis® insecticide. In 2017, BASF spent €507 million on research and development in the Crop Protection division. The distinction was awarded for excellent product design in the Building and Elements category. The expert jury stressed particularly the varied opportunities that SLENTITE® offers architects, designers and planners as a result of its special product characteristics.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/02/p-18-120.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/02/p-18-114" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/02/p-18-114.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF breaks down the 2017 automotive colors market||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/02/p-18-114.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">February 8, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF breaks down the 2017 automotive colors market</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">With the “BASF Color Report For Automotive OEM Coatings”, BASF’s Coatings division provides a global analysis of the color distribution in the 2017 automotive market. Globally, white maintains its strong position in all segments and still is the number one color with a market share of almost 40 percent. Together with black, gray, and silver, the achromatic colors continue to be the most prominent. When it comes to chromatic colors, the share of blue and red is almost equal, followed by brown. The global overview of the car segments shows: the smaller the car the more vivid the color.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/02/p-18-114.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/02/p-18-115" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/02/p-18-115.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF introduces Boroflex™ FCC catalyst for superior bottoms upgrading||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/02/p-18-115.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">February 1, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF introduces Boroflex™ FCC catalyst for superior bottoms upgrading</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF announced today the commercial launch of Boroflex™, the latest evolution of its residuum (resid) oil Fluid Catalytic Cracking (FCC) catalysts for the refining market. Boroflex is based on BASF’s unique Boron-Based Technology (BBT), and is designed to optimize refiners’ bottoms upgrading and distillate yields by providing maximum nickel contamination passivation.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/02/p-18-115.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/02/p-18-117" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/02/p-18-117.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF finalizes the divestiture of its Pischelsdorf production site in Austria to Synthomer Austria GmbH||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/02/p-18-117.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">February 1, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF finalizes the divestiture of its Pischelsdorf production site in Austria to Synthomer Austria GmbH</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, Germany, February 1, 2018 – BASF has completed the announced divestiture of the production site for styrene-butadiene-based paper dispersions in Pischelsdorf, Austria to Synthomer Austria GmbH, a subsidiary of the British specialty chemicals manufacturer Synthomer plc. Consent by the competent antitrust authorities has been obtained.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/02/p-18-117.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/01/p-18-106" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/01/p-18-106.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF grants Reshine a Sub-License under ANL NCM Cathode Material Patents||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/01/p-18-106.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">January 31, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF grants Reshine a Sub-License under ANL NCM Cathode Material Patents</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">ISELIN, NJ, USA and HUNAN, CHINA, 31 JANUARY 2018 – BASF has granted Hunan Reshine New Material Co. Ltd. (“Reshine”) a sub-license under Argonne National Laboratory (ANL) patents related to nickel-cobalt-manganese (NCM) cathode materials for long life, high energy, reliability and cost-effective lithium ion batteries. Reshine is now licensed to make, use, sell, offer to sell, distribute and import the NCM cathode materials in the U.S. market.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/01/p-18-106.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/01/p-18-112" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/01/p-18-112.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF will start construction of new MDI synthesis unit in Geismar, Louisiana||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/01/p-18-112.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">January 31, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF will start construction of new MDI synthesis unit in Geismar, Louisiana</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, Germany / Geismar, Louisiana – BASF will start the construction of a new methylene diphenyl diisocyanate (MDI) synthesis unit at the company’s Verbund site in Geismar, Louisiana, in early Q2 2018. Following a fire at the plant on October 31, 2017, BASF was forced to declare Force Majeure on all its Citral and Isoprenol-based aroma ingredients and on Vitamin A and E, and several Carotenoid products. The website also provides up-to-date estimations of product availability after the start-up of the plant.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/01/p-18-100.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/01/p-18-101" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/01/p-18-101.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Cosmetagora 2018: BASF’s “Be authentic” concept addresses nature-oriented lifestyles||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/01/p-18-101.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">January 9, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Cosmetagora 2018: BASF’s “Be authentic” concept addresses nature-oriented lifestyles</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Paris, France – January 9, 2018. The concept comprises two collections of appealing formulations – Mediterranean Influences and Experimental Nomad – that are inspired by the latest beauty trends, identified by French trend consulting agency Peclers. “The cosmetics sector is currently experiencing major change. More and more consumers are looking for products that fit in with an authentic, back-to-nature lifestyle,” said Marine Belthé, BASF Personal Care Europe. “Our ‘Be authentic’ concept gives manufacturers of cosmetics and personal-care products ideas on how to create rich, nature-inspired all-in-one formulations for beauty products on the go."</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/01/p-18-101.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/01/p-18-102" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/01/p-18-102.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF’s new active ingredients provide an effective response to correct the signs of skin and hair aging||/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/01/p-18-102.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><span class="news-result__category" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Trade News</span><span data-v-5db4dc0c=""> | </span><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">January 9, 2018</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF’s new active ingredients provide an effective response to correct the signs of skin and hair aging</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Paris, France – January 9, 2018. As the pace of life remains fast, products that calm, sooth and rejuvenate the skin are in high demand. Inspired by life, BASF is presenting new active ingredients for skin and hair care products that have been proven to help the skin rebalance and that strengthen it to cope with everyday stresses. youth.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2018/01/p-18-102.html" language)</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Innovation für den Klimaschutz: Forscher von BASF, Linde und RWE Power haben am Innovationszentrum Kohle in Niederaußem eines der weltweit führenden CO2-Abtrennungsverfahren für Kraftwerke entscheidend weiter entwickelt und die Voraussetzungen für den großtechnischen Einsatz geschaffen.</div><div data-tracking-value="news||Change in leadership: BASF decides on succession||/global/en/media/news-releases/2017/12/p-17-401.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div
