These include concrete admixtures product ranges such as MasterGlenium®, MasterPolyheed®, MasterRheobuild® and MasterPozzolith®. The new plant will allow BASF to better meet the increasing demand for construction chemicals to customers in Sri Lanka. The site is supported by an office, warehouse and a well-equipped testing lab that will deliver tailor-made recipes through formulation excellence.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/08/p-16-283.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/08/p-16-273" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/08/p-16-273.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Henkel, BASF and Solidaridad support around 5,500 smallholders in Indonesia||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/08/p-16-273.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">August 18, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Henkel, BASF and Solidaridad support around 5,500 smallholders in Indonesia</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">When renewable raw materials such as palm oil and palm kernel oil are used, the main focus is on economic, environmental and social impacts along the entire supply chain – from field to shelf. Small farms produce around 40 percent of the world’s palm and palm kernel oil. An important question for the oil producing countries is how to increase the yields from the land already under cultivation. This is why Henkel and BASF are collaborating with the development organization Solidaridad to support a project in Indonesia and advocate for smallholders and local initiatives.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/08/p-16-273.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/08/p-16-282" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/08/p-16-282.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||First-time use of Basotect® in acoustic unit with active and passive sound cancellation||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/08/p-16-282.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">August 18, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">First-time use of Basotect® in acoustic unit with active and passive sound cancellation</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Basotect®, the lightweight melamine foam that contains no glass or mineral fibers is the material of choice for use in HVAC (Heating, Ventilation, Air Conditioning) components of HOWATHERM, thanks to its outstanding noise absorption in the medium and high frequency range (500 Hz – 5,000 Hz). The foam is easy to process and contributes to both outstanding acoustics and, thanks to its fire resistance, a high level of fire safety.</div><div class="search-result__actions" Alabama</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">FLORHAM PARK, NJ, and BRIDGEWATER, NJ – July 19, 2016 – BASF, the world’s leading chemical company, and The Linde Group, a technology company, successfully completed a joint pilot project to improve capture of carbon dioxide (CO2) from flue gas at a coal fired power plant at the National Carbon Capture Center (NCCC).</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-IR-160719.html" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 14, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Materials from BASF help make new Yamaha concept vehicle comfortable for short distance travel</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">With the help of BASF’s versatile plastic materials, the new three-wheeled concept vehicle 05GEN from Yamaha Motor Co., Ltd makes short journeys both comfortable and convenient. This new generation electric-assist vehicle adopts BASF’s plastics solutions including Infinergy® and Elastollan® and is on display at the Toyo Ito Museum of Architecture, Imabari, Omishima Island in Japan from July 14, 2016, until June 15, 2017.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-16-266.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-16-249" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-16-249.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Foaming simulation of polyurethane systems for the automotive interior||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-16-249.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 13, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Foaming simulation of polyurethane systems for the automotive interior</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF now offers an additional service for polyurethane systems in automotive interiors. BASF’s Ultrasim® simulation tool has been expanded so that the behavior of PU systems during foaming can now be reliably predicted. The new service has proved especially successful with instrument panels made with the Elastoflex® E semi-rigid system. The automotive supplier Yanfeng Automotive Interiors is using the virtual process design for the instrument panels in the BMW X1.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-16-249.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-16-248" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-16-248.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||SLENTITE®: Successful piloting of new high-performance insulation material for customized climate management ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-16-248.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 12, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">SLENTITE®: Successful piloting of new high-performance insulation material for customized climate management </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">SLENTITE®, BASF’s new high-performance insulation material, is now entering its market preparation phase. After the commissioning of the pilot plant for the production of sample quantities in June 2015, the production process for the novel PU aerogel has advanced to the next level. In March 2016, SLENTITE was exhibited for the first time in an application of a cooperation partner. At “Frontale”, the biggest European trade show for window construction, doors and facades in Nürnberg, possible applications were presented in two Beck+Heun products.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-16-248.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-16-246" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-16-246.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Tailored polyamide portfolio for the charge-air duct in modern combustion engines||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-16-246.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 7, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Tailored polyamide portfolio for the charge-air duct in modern combustion engines</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF is responding to the development in engine designs with a consistent portfolio of PA6 and PA66 grades that meet the higher demands on the materials. Depending on the base polymer and stabilization system, the materials are resistant to heat aging up to 220°C and show excellent burst pressure and weld strength. This means the part developer can be provided with the optimum material for each component in the charge-air duct that offers the best value for money. Selected grades are based on global specifications, supplied from local production.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-16-246.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-16-247" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-16-247.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Just brilliant, this new effect pigment!||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-16-247.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 7, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Just brilliant, this new effect pigment!</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF will present Lumina® Royal Dragon Gold effect pigment, the newest member of Lumina Royal product family during the 2016 K trade fair in Düsseldorf from October 19th – 26th. The new Lumina Royal Dragon Gold EH 0908 is a brilliant green shade gold mica effect pigment that offers the highest lightness and strongest sparkle in styling for yellows and greens. It extends the color space potential of high chroma shades for packaging, consumer electronics, household appliances, sporting goods and other specialty applications.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-16-247.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-CI-160706" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-CI-160706.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF and Markor start up new Polytetrahydrofuran plant in Xinjiang, China||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-CI-160706.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 6, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF and Markor start up new Polytetrahydrofuran plant in Xinjiang, China</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Shanghai, China – July 6, 2016 – Today BASF and Xinjiang Markor Chemical Industry Co., Ltd. (“Markor”) inaugurated a new PolyTHF® (polytetrahydrofuran, chemical name: polytetramethylene ether glycol) plant in Korla, Xinjiang Uygur autonomous region in northwest China. Commercial products are now available for delivery to local customers in China.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-CI-160706.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-IR-160706" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-IR-160706.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF and Markor start up new Polytetrahydrofuran plant in Xinjiang, China||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-IR-160706.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 6, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF and Markor start up new Polytetrahydrofuran plant in Xinjiang, China</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Shanghai, China – July 6, 2016 – Today BASF and Xinjiang Markor Chemical Industry Co., Ltd. (“Markor”) inaugurated a new PolyTHF® (polytetrahydrofuran, chemical name: polytetramethylene ether glycol) plant in Korla, Xinjiang Uygur autonomous region in northwest China. Commercial products are now available for delivery to local customers in China.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-IR-160706.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-16-244" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-16-244.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||New welding technology for thick insulation boards||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-16-244.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 5, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">New welding technology for thick insulation boards</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF has worked with a well-known machine manufacturer to develop a new technology for welding insulation boards. The contactless, thermal welding process makes it possible to combine a variety of insulation materials. For example, Styrodur®, the extruded rigid polystyrene foam from BASF, can be combined with polyurethane, inorganic insulation materials, or the melamine resin foam Basotect® to form completely new insulation material solutions. The Styrodur portfolio also includes new, especially thick boards made using this process in the highly compression-proof varieties Styrodur 4000 CS and 5000 CS. The boards cover the thickness range from 60 mm to 240 mm with a consistently good insulation value (lambda: 0.035 W/(m·K)).</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-16-244.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-16-245" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-16-245.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF presents new Ultramid® copolyamide for film and monofilament applications||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-16-245.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 5, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF presents new Ultramid® copolyamide for film and monofilament applications</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">As of now, BASF offers a new, high-quality Ultramid® for film and monofilament applications such as fishing lines with Ultramid C37LC. Ultramid C37LC is a PA6/6.6 copolyamide. It allows manufacturers of shrink film for food packaging to achieve higher hot water and hot air shrinking. The manufacturer can thus forgo the otherwise usual admixture of amorphous polyamides, which makes the production process leaner and more efficient.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-16-245.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-16-259" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-16-259.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF completes divestiture of global Polyolefin Catalysts business to W. R. Grace &amp; Co.||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-16-259.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">July 1, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF completes divestiture of global Polyolefin Catalysts business to W. R. Grace &amp; Co.</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, Germany – July 1, 2016 – BASF has closed the previously announced transaction to divest its global Polyolefin Catalysts business to W. R. Grace &amp; Co., a global leader in specialty chemicals and materials. The relevant merger control approvals have already been granted.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/07/p-16-259.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-242" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-242.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Smart pallets for cost-effective supply chains: Resistant thanks to Elastocoat® C from BASF||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-242.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 30, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Smart pallets for cost-effective supply chains: Resistant thanks to Elastocoat® C from BASF</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF is collaborating with the Dutch start-up company Ahrma Holding B.V., whose aim is to launch a completely new pallet concept on the logistics market. For the purpose of coating the extremely robust hybrid pallets made from medium density fiberboard (MDF) and plastic, the formulation of BASF’s Elastocoat® C spray system was developed further.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-242.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-243" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-243.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF's competence in plastic additives helps polymer products withstand harsh weather conditions ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-243.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 30, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF's competence in plastic additives helps polymer products withstand harsh weather conditions </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF Plastic Additives’ core competence lies in light, thermal and process stabilization, allowing polymer producers and converters maximize plastics properties retention and extension. With Tinuvin® 880 and Tinuvin® XT 55, BASF launches the latest generation of light stabilizers at K 2016, the world’s leading trade fair for plastics and rubber.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-243.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-260" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-260.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF launches new global pigments brand||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-260.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 30, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF launches new global pigments brand</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">LUDWIGSHAFEN, GERMANY / SOUTHFIELD, MI, June 30, 2016 – BASF announced today the launch of its Colors &amp; Effects brand, bundling BASF’s global pigments business. The new brand encompasses BASF’s distinct colorants and effect pigments portfolio, and serves customers across five key industries, including coatings, plastics, printing, cosmetics, and agriculture.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-260.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-239" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-239.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||New Ultramid® product for window systems||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-239.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 29, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">New Ultramid® product for window systems</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">With the new Ultramid® LFX, it is now possible to configure window systems even more effectively. Reinforced with long glass fibers, the polyamide delivers significant benefits over conventional materials like metals and scores highly with outstanding strength and good insulation properties. The component also enables intelligent window design.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-239.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-240" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-240.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Ultramid® Advanced N: new polyphthalamide portfolio for sophisticated components in the automotive and electronics industries||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-240.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 29, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ultramid® Advanced N: new polyphthalamide portfolio for sophisticated components in the automotive and electronics industries</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">At the K Fair 2016, engineers can ask for the support of a new superhero: Ultramid® Advanced N. With this material, BASF is expanding its range of partially aromatic polyamides and launching a new polyphthalamide (PPA) portfolio on the market. It comprises unreinforced compounds and compounds reinforced with short or long glass fibers as well as flame-retardant grades. They exceed the properties of conventional PPA plastics. BASF offers selected grades for customer projects around the world from now on.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-240.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-241" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-241.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF extends its portfolio of innovative foam solutions with ecovio® EA||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-241.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 29, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF extends its portfolio of innovative foam solutions with ecovio® EA</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF is expanding its range of high performance foam products with the innovative, certified compostable particle foam ecovio® EA. The product is predominantly biobased and, like all of the grades under the ecovio® brand, it supports the biological cycle through its certified compostability. The excellent properties of the patented particle foam make it particularly suitable for transport packaging for high-value or delicate goods where a high level of impact resistance and robustness is vital. The product properties are similar to those of EPS and boast outstanding energy absorption and very good resilience even when subjected to multiple impact loads. The high biobased content and the certified compostability make ecovio EA particularly attractive wherever a fossil packaging solution no longer meets customers’ requirements for a biobased and biodegradable transport solution.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-241.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-255" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-255.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Universal Display Corporation Acquires BASF’s OLED Intellectual Property Assets||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-255.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 29, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Universal Display Corporation Acquires BASF’s OLED Intellectual Property Assets</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ewing, New Jersey &amp; Ludwigshafen, Germany – June 29, 2016 - Universal Display Corporation (Nasdaq: OLED), enabling energy-efficient displays and lighting with its UniversalPHOLED® technology and materials, announced yesterday that through its wholly-owned subsidiary UDC Ireland Limited, it has acquired the OLED Intellectual Property (IP) assets of BASF SE (XETRA: BAS), the world’s leading chemical company. Representing 15 years of research and development, the assets include over 500 issued and pending patents around the world, in 86 patent families. Largely consisting of phosphorescent materials and technologies, BASF’s OLED portfolio has an average lifetime of 10 years. The purchase price for the acquisition is approximately €87 million.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-255.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-256" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-256.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF reveals exciting new additions to its aroma ingredients portfolio||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-256.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 27, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF reveals exciting new additions to its aroma ingredients portfolio</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, Germany, June 27, 2016 – BASF exhibited its broad portfolio of aroma ingredients at the 2016 World Perfumery Congress at Fontainebleau Resort in Miami from June 13-15. And what does this material feel like? “Material Selection 16/17”, the first trend book by the designfabrik® and the scouting team of BASF's Performance Materials division provides all the answers.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-232.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-230" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-230.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF’s leading-edge protection for rotor blades passes 50 hours rain test||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-230.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 13, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF’s leading-edge protection for rotor blades passes 50 hours rain test</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF supports the wind energy sector with special systems and products and has launched an innovative coatings solution for rotor blades: RELEST® Wind LEP S. It has recently passed an external 50 hours rain erosion test by a renowned institute from Denmark and thus outperformed other well-known rain erosion resistant coatings.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-230.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-229" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-229.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF expands automotive coatings production in Thailand to better serve ASEAN market||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-229.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 10, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF expands automotive coatings production in Thailand to better serve ASEAN market</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF will strengthen its local production capability for waterborne and solventborne coatings in Thailand by building a new manufacturing facility at its Bangpoo site. The new production facility complements the facilities at the new Coatings Technical Competence Center ASEAN, which was opened in September 2015 and includes a laboratory for product development, performance testing, color design, as well as a small batch production unit. The expansion will better serve the strong demand from the expanding automotive industry in ASEAN.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-229.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-223" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-223.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Documentary film “Experiment 150” celebrates premiere||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-223.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 9, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Documentary film “Experiment 150” celebrates premiere</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, Germany, June 9, 2016 – For two years, prize-winning director Thomas Grube documented the worldwide activities celebrating BASF’s 150th anniversary: from the preparation of the program, to the kick-off of the Creator SpaceTM tour in Mumbai, to the finale of the anniversary in Ludwigshafen. The resulting film “Experiment 150 – Co-creating for a sustainable future” will celebrate its premiere on Friday, June 24 at the Festival of German Film (Festival des Deutschen Films) in the Parkinsel district of Ludwigshafen.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-223.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-210" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-210.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Speeding up and focusing research activities||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-210.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 8, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Speeding up and focusing research activities</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, Germany – June 8, 2016 – The innovation-driven world of chemical and technology companies is characterized by a constant process of change. To maintain its successful track record in this environment, BASF is further speeding up and focusing its research and development activities, said Dr. Martin Brudermüller, Vice Chairman of the Board of Executive Directors and Chief Technology Officer of BASF, at the Research Press Conference held today in Ludwigshafen. Even though BASF’s research is already very successful with an output of about €10 billion sales from innovative products, the company needs to adapt its established approaches to changing conditions, said Brudermüller.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-210.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-224" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-224.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF expands production capacities for Laromer® UV/EB acrylates in Europe||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/06/p-16-224.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">June 6, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF expands production capacities for Laromer® UV/EB acrylates in Europe</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF is extending its existing production facilities for Laromer® UV/EB acrylates, which are part of BASF’s C3-Verbund system, at its Ludwigshafen site in Germany. By significantly increasing its production capacities, BASF is responding to the rising demand for high-quality UV/EB acrylates and strengthening its position as one of the world’s leading manufacturers of UV/EB resins used as binders for energy-curable coatings and inks. The additional capacities will be available as of the 3rd quarter of 2016.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" Prices for Formic Acid 94% will be increased accordingly on a pro rata basis. In North America, BASF is raising prices by 0.02 USD per lb (or 44 USD/mt) for Formic Acid 85%. Prices for all other concentrations of Formic Acid will be increased accordingly on a pro rata basis.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-221.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-216" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-216.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||New Eco-Efficiency Analysis proves benefits of BASF’s water-based adhesives for flexible food packaging||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-216.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 30, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">New Eco-Efficiency Analysis proves benefits of BASF’s water-based adhesives for flexible food packaging</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF’s water-based adhesive systems are an environmentally compatible and economically rewarding alternative to conventional technologies when it comes to lamination of flexible food packaging. Construction chemical products from BASF helped make the construction of the world’s longest rail tunnel possible. “We are proud that we were able to contribute our innovative solutions and know-how to help our customers master the challenges of this monumental construction project,” said Ralf Spettmann, President of the Construction Chemicals division at BASF.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-212.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-217" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-217.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Colorcon and BASF advance co-operation to offer superior functional coatings for pharmaceutical tablets||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-217.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 25, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Colorcon and BASF advance co-operation to offer superior functional coatings for pharmaceutical tablets</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Harleysville, PA, USA / Ludwigshafen, Germany, May 25, 2016 – Colorcon, Inc. and BASF announced today that they have signed an agreement to further strengthen their co-operation in the area of pharmaceutical film coatings. As part of this agreement, BASF will sell its Kollicoat® IR Coating Systems product line to Colorcon; including the current customer business, inventory and relevant know-how. The addition of the Kollicoat® IR Coating Systems complements Colorcon’s existing film coating product line and position as a leading innovator of fully formulated film coating systems and provides Kollicoat® IR Coating Systems customers with a wide range of film coating options. Final closure of the transaction is subject to review of the Brazilian competition authorities.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-217.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-207" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-207.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF provides unmatched comfort and quiet on board new luxury yacht ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-207.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 24, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF provides unmatched comfort and quiet on board new luxury yacht </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">The melamine foam Basotect® is applied to the new 108 ft. series from Sunbird Yacht Co., Ltd. (Sunbird), to reduce noise from the engine. This will provide owners and guests with unmatched comfort and quietness on board. The additional capacity will be available by year-end 2017.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-203.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-201" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-201.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF’s Automotive Color Trends 2016/17 see urban and natural inspired colors creating a parallax||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-201.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 11, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF’s Automotive Color Trends 2016/17 see urban and natural inspired colors creating a parallax</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Predicting the up-and-coming colors of automotive design is a challenge the designers from BASF’s Coatings division tackle every year. The two competing vantage points that shape our modern world are: the fascination of the virtual world and the longing for honest self-expression.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-201.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-200" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-200.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Pilot plant for manufacture of high-temperature superconductors goes on stream||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-200.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/4014_Superconductors_make_efficient_power_transmission_possible:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="rendition ls-is-cached lazyloaded" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 10, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Pilot plant for manufacture of high-temperature superconductors goes on stream</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Today, Deutsche Nanoschicht GmbH, a wholly owned subsidiary of BASF New Business GmbH, is opening its new pilot plant for the manufacture of high temperature superconductors. The Network represents a community of 25 Green Building Councils (GBCs) and over 5,000 company members who cooperate closely to support growth of the sustainable building movement in Europe, including policy dialogue and support of sustainable construction activities.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-195.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/P-CI-Oase-160504" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/P-CI-Oase-160504.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF inaugurates new branch in Abu Dhabi||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/P-CI-Oase-160504.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 4, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF inaugurates new branch in Abu Dhabi</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates, May 4, 2016 – BASF, the world's leading chemical company, and the Kanoo Group, one of the largest independent, family-owned companies in the Gulf region with extensive operations in the countries of the Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC), today inaugurated a new branch office in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates (UAE). Housed in the Nation Towers close to the Corniche, the new office is located centrally in Abu Dhabi city.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/P-CI-Oase-160504.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-189" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-189.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Resilient Riding Fun for Cool Cruisers||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-189.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P189_Longboard_55-1:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="lazyload rendition" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 4, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Resilient Riding Fun for Cool Cruisers</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">About one meter long, the hip longboards offer enough space and stability for non-artists. Broad wheels of elastic plastic provide good ground contact and absorb any shocks from uneven surfaces. High-quality longboard wheels of the kind produced by the Californian manufacturer AEND Industries, for example, are made from polyurethane cast elastomers. These plastic systems combine resilient elasticity, mechanical load bearing capacity and high abrasion resistance in an almost ideal manner. With the polyurethanes of known versatility, it is the combination of selected components that unites the apparently contrasting properties. The MDI molecules commonly present in polyurethanes usually act as the hard segment in the plastic, while PolyTHF® from BASF is used by the Californian specialists as the soft segment for this ambitious application.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-189.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-192" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-192.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF awarded as highly innovative automotive supplier ||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-192.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 4, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF awarded as highly innovative automotive supplier </h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF has received the AutomotiveINNOVATIONS Award 2016 as the most innovative supplier in the category „chassis, body and exterior“ One of the innovations the jury’s decision was based on is the world's first top mount with a bearing and housing made of plastics. The ceremony took place on April 27, 2016, at PricewaterhouseCoopers AG (PwC) in Frankfurt.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-192.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-196" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-196.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||For gearboxes that breathe easily||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-196.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><img src="https://dynamicassets.basf.com/is/image/basf/P196_16_Sensordeckel_Ultradur_HR:16x9?dpr=off&amp;fmt=webp-alpha&amp;fit=crop%2C1&amp;wid=200&amp;hei=113" height="0" width="0" class="lazyload rendition" alt="" title="" data-v-b75ef9ba=""></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 4, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">For gearboxes that breathe easily</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">With BASF’s hydrolysis-resistant plastic Ultradur® HR and BASF’s know-how in ultrasonic welding, the company Rosenberger Spritzguss und Formenbau has now managed to develop a new type of carrier for hall effect sensors. It combines the housing and printed circuit board in one component and is injection-molded in a single, fully automated production step.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-196.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-199" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-199.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Waldemar Helber succeeds Wolfgang Daniel as employee representative on BASF’s Supervisory Board||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-199.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 4, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Waldemar Helber succeeds Wolfgang Daniel as employee representative on BASF’s Supervisory Board</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Effective April 29, 2016, Waldemar Helber joins the Supervisory Board of BASF SE as employee representative. He succeeds as elected substitute member Wolfgang Daniel, who retired from the Supervisory Board following the Annual Shareholders’ Meeting on April 29, 2016.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-199.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-172" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-172.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF welcomes EU approval for zinc oxide||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-172.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 2, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF welcomes EU approval for zinc oxide</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, Germany – May 2, 2016 – BASF welcomes the official entry of zinc oxide into Annex VI of the EU Cosmetics Regulation. Zinc oxide – in both its nano and non-nano form – is now approved for use as a UV filter in cosmetics in Europe. “UV radiation is responsible for various physiological effects in the skin. These include sunburn, premature appearance of wrinkles and – with frequent intensive exposure – an increased risk of skin cancer,” said Dirk Mampe, Head of Business Management for Personal Care Specialties in Europe. “Each approval of a UV filter offers new options and a wider choice for formulators of sun care products to provide vital protection for the skin against these harmful effects of UV radiation. After the EU approval of Tinosorb® A2B as the first nano UV filter in 2014, we now welcome the official entry of zinc oxide in its nano form into Annex VI of the EU Cosmetics Regulation.”</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-172.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-193" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-193.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF opens new concrete admixture plant in Bắc Giang, Vietnam||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-193.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">May 2, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF opens new concrete admixture plant in Bắc Giang, Vietnam</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Hanoi, Vietnam – May 2, 2016 – BASF inaugurated its new production plant for concrete admixtures in the northern province of Bắc Giang, Vietnam. The new plant will allow BASF to better meet the increasing demands for high quality construction chemicals products in Vietnam.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/05/p-16-193.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/04/p-16-175" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/04/p-16-175.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF with slightly lower earnings before special items; outlook 2016 confirmed||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/04/p-16-175.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">April 29, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF with slightly lower earnings before special items; outlook 2016 confirmed</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, Germany – April 29, 2016 – In the first quarter of 2016, BASF Group sales decreased by 29% to €14.2 billion compared with the same quarter of the previous year. The website also explains the participation conditions, procedure and selection process. Deadline for applications: August 12, 2016. forces for sustainable solutions that help customers drive business success</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Paris, France – April 12, 2016 – For a growing number of consumers, product sustainability is a crucial factor in their purchasing decision. At the same time, personal care manufacturers are looking to contribute to a more sustainable future. Under the slogan “All about tomorrow”, BASF is inviting visitors to in-cosmetics 2016 to join forces: “Together with our partners in the value chain we want to drive sustainable solutions to improve quality of life,” said Dirk Mampe, Head of Business Management for Personal Care Specialties in Europe.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/04/p-16-170.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/04/p-16-171" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/04/p-16-171.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF’s Inspiring Textures concept offers new formulations for irresistible skin feels||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/04/p-16-171.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">April 12, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF’s Inspiring Textures concept offers new formulations for irresistible skin feels</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Düsseldorf, Germany – April 12, 2016 – Building on the success of “Sensory 2.0” at in-cosmetics in Barcelona and driven by market trends such as living new experiences or going back to essentials, BASF is unveiling the Inspiring Textures concept at in-cosmetics 2016 in Paris (booth R70). CAM-7 is a patented cathode material that harnesses the unique properties of high-nickel compounds to deliver high energy density with high-power capability.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/04/p-16-177.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/04/p-16-167" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/04/p-16-167.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Master Builders Solutions experts from BASF are presenting Ucrete at the IFFA 2016||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/04/p-16-167.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">April 7, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Master Builders Solutions experts from BASF are presenting Ucrete at the IFFA 2016</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Ludwigshafen, Germany – April 07, 2016 – The Master Builders Solutions experts from BASF are presenting the Ucrete high performance hygienic floor at IFFA from May 7 – 12 in Frankfurt am Main, Germany. Inscalis is the pioneer solution from a novel chemical class, the pyropenes, offering an alternative mode of action for the control of key insect pests and providing an essential tool to farmers for use in resistance and integrated pest management programs. Inscalis controls critical piercing and sucking insect pests such as aphids, whiteflies, psyllids, scales, and leafhoppers.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/04/p-16-168.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/04/p-WH-160407" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/04/p-WH-160407.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||Wintershall raises oil and gas production again||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/04/p-WH-160407.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">April 7, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Wintershall raises oil and gas production again</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Kassel. Wintershall made a profit of more than 1 billion euros in 2015 for the fifth year in a row – despite the challenging economic environment. Earnings after taxes and minority interests totaled 1.050 billion euros (2014: 1.464). “Despite the major fall in the oil and gas prices compared to 2014, we once again proved Wintershall’s competitiveness and robustness in 2015,” Mario Mehren, Chairman of the Board of Executive Directors of Wintershall, said at the company’s Annual Press Conference in Kassel.</div><div class="search-result__actions" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><a class="search-result__read-more basf:link-unstyled" href="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/04/p-WH-160407.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Read More</a></div></div></div><div class="news-result search-result" data-component-single-link="/content/basf/www/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/04/p-16-165" data-url-component-single-link="/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/04/p-16-165.html" data-tracking-type="navigation" data-tracking-category="link" data-tracking-action="click news-link" data-tracking-value="news||BASF binder helps produce worldwide first automobile roof frame made of natural fiber||/global/en/media/news-releases/2016/04/p-16-165.html" data-v-5db4dc0c="" data-v-c959c6c8=""><div class="search-result__teaser" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="picture-container" data-v-b75ef9ba="" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="search-result__content" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><div class="search-result__header" data-v-5db4dc0c=""><!--v-if--><!--v-if--><span class="news-result__date" data-v-5db4dc0c="">April 6, 2016</span></div><h3 class="search-result__title" data-v-5db4dc0c="">BASF binder helps produce worldwide first automobile roof frame made of natural fiber</h3><div class="search-result__description" data-v-5db4dc0c="">Together with the International Automotive Components Group (IAC), a global leading supplier to the automobile industry, BASF has developed the worldwide first roof frame for cars that is entirely made of natural fiber.
